choices: You decide to go for a swim
Fran calls you into her office.
You go for an early patrol
One of the Psychos got Loose Again
1.content:
It's just another day at Gravefield Beach, or rather what accounts for a day. In this crazy monster town, you can't tell if it's day or night. Your alarm clock rings and you get out of bed as you let out a yawn. You check your watch and let out a sigh. "Still early," you mutter to yourself. "Well, I'm up." You walk out and look out the inside of your... house. Well, okay, it's the inside of a fire extinguisher cabinet. But it's something.

You're lucky to have lasted this long. Just a few months ago, you were sailing with some friends when a huge storm rocked the boat and crashed you onto the shores of this beach. You were lucky to have survived, but imagine your surprise when you landed on a beach filled with giant monsters. Fortunately, the manager of the beach gave you a job as a lifeguard. It's not much of a job considering all you can do is act as a second pair of eyes to a giant gargoyle. But Roxy was a nice partner and you always felt safe around her.

But it's still early. So what are you going to do with your time before you have to punch the clock?
1.title: Just Another Day

choices: Roxy Flies Overhead and sees you
One of the surfers comes forward
A wave takes you to the Horrorville side
11.content:
You decide the best idea would be to go for a swim. You could use a little extra exercise before you have to go. So you walk down the stairs Fran put in for you and then you walk out to the ocean. You strip down and then put on your bathing suit as you walk towards the water. But then you realize something. You look around and make sure Paisley isn't in sight.

You used to think that mermaids were a dream come true if they were real, but there was nothing dreaming about that mermaid. She was rude to the beach goers and she even spit at Roxy one time. What's worse is that she saw you as little more than a snack and you wouldn't be surprised if she was the reason you were the only survivor of the shipwreck. But fortunately she was nowhere in sight.

You sigh in relief and then swim out. You couldn't believe it. Even the shallow end of the water was deep to a human like you and as you swim out, you see just how deep it is. It's a good thing you're in top physical shape or this would end dangerously. But even with your muscles, you were weak as a kitten compared to monsters hundreds of feet tall.

But then you hear something.
11.title: Open Water

111.content:
You realize that famous sound that the water had in store for you. It was your worst enemy... The mermaid girl known as Paisley. She remember telling you that if she saw you in the water, you would become her next meal, and that is something you don't want. You then sees some hair rising out and then the face then rising as you swims like hell to get out of the water begins heyougets into trouble.

"I got you...." Paisley smirked evilly as she swims towards you (who is slow of course, etc) but.... Will you make it out in time?
111.title: Oh no! It's Paisley

choices: Paisely manages to climb out of the water to chase after you.
Who else is gonna give you trouble today?
1111.content:
You make it clear out of the water well ahead of Paisley. It's actually a record for you.

"Man....." Paisely groans. She then grins. "Sure you don't want to come back in though. I promise I'll be nice....." she sing songs.

"Yeah....nice try." You mutter. You might be a human but you're certainly not dumb enough to fall for that. "Better luck next time I guess. Actually wait no. That would be terrible for me."

You start to walk away. Not noticing Paisely hissing in rage behind you.
1111.title: Yes!

choices: No, it Has a Different Effect Altogether
11111.content:
"No bloody human gets the best of Paisley Van Manen! You're gonna be my brunch if I have to chase you straight to hell!" You give a scoff. "Yeah right," you say. "You can't even leave the water." "Wanna bet?" Paisley swims back and then she moves at supersonic speed through the water to leap out. You hear her hiss and look into the air and scream. Paisley lands right behind you and you're forced to run as the mermaid tries crawling on her hands to move through the sand. "Get back here you little bicky!" Paisley snaps her fangs at you as she crawls after you.

However, once you're up ahead, you see that Paisley is crawling at a snail's pace. Being a mermaid, she was virtually immobile on the land and you let out a laugh as she's trying to come after you. "You'll be laughing from the inside of my belly, you twerp!" Paisley showed her sharp teeth and snapped them, but you walk slowly away as she tries to chase you. "You're out of shape, Paisley," you say. "Get that lardass of yours back in the water." Paisley grits her teeth. "For your information, mermaids do not have asses! I'm going to get you!" You just walk away as Paisley is struggling to go after you. That's when Paisley notices that she's several feet (in monster terms) away from the water. "Bugger." The mermaid groans to herself. At this point you're long gone and Paisley is beyond pissed that she's stranded.

- - - - - - - - - -

Soon Stella is flying over and flies down slightly to destroy a little gargoyle girl's sandcastle to make her cry. "I love making gargoyles miserable." Says that obnoxious pixie to herself. That's when Stella looks ahead and gasps because she sees Paisley beached in the sand. "Paisley!?" Paisley at this point is weak and looks physically ill as she sweats heavily under the hot sun right as Stella flies down to her. "Paisley!" Paisley lets out a groan. "Good day, Stella." She says weakly. Stella is the only monster on the land that Paisley gets along with, mainly because they both enjoy tormenting you. "Don't worry, Paisley," says Stella. "I'll get you back to the water." Stella grabs Paisley by the tail and flies in the air, dangly Paisley and making her grunt. Paisley begins to turn pale due to the fact that she wasn't used to being in the sky and looked like she would vomit.

Fortunately for her, Stella drops her with a splash back into the water. "How did you get yourself beached, Paisley?" Paisley lets out a hiss. "That bloody Stephen got away from me again. I thought if I went after him on the land, I could get him but I completely forgot mermaids can't move out of the water." "Damn," says Stella. "I'd sure love to hear that little twerp scream in agony going down your throat. But you can only get him if he goes near the water." Paisley lets out a groan. Stella then gasps. "Wait here." She says. Stella flies off as Paisley looks in confusion.

- - - - - - - - - -

By the time Stella returns, Paisley is picking her teeth with a fishbone. Stella flies down into the water and holds up a strange potion. "What the Davy Jones is that?" Paisley gives a smirk. "This is a potion I bought from a kappa from Horrorville. It has the power to make two monster exchange species?" Paisley is even more confused as Stella pours the elixir into two glasses. "It couldn't be any simpler. It will turn you into a fairy and me into a mermaid and once you're able to leave the water, it's munch time for Stephen." Paisley raises an eyebrow. "I hope it works and that it isn't permanent. I'd hate to lose my gills forever." Stella smiles wickedly and hands Paisley her glass.

Both of your enemies drink the potion but does it work...
11111.title: Fish Out of Water

1112.content:
You thrash your arms, trying to gain more momentum in the water as you book it to the shore. But your speed was nothing compared to the water adapted Paisley. She charged at you, her tail fin gliding across the water as she picked up speed. You look behind you and scream as she opens her mouth just mere feet away from you. "SOMEONE! HELP!"

Paisley let out an open mouthed giggle as your feet entered her mouth. You feel the water current changing as it enters her mouth, and you panic more, your limbs thrashing. Paisley's tongue touches your feet, and as by instinct, it wraps around a thashing leg, and starts to pull. You let out one final scream as your body is dragged underwater into her mouth. She closes her mouth with a dramatic nash, smiling as she dives back underwater.

You flail around the water in her mouth, trying as hard as you can to hold your breath as the tongue pushes you, tasting your body. Then, you feel a slight bit of pressure, and you are pulled in one direction, soon sliding downwards. You gasp as you are pulled into her throat, your lungs starting to fill with water, and with one final gulp, you are sucked down into the giant chasm that is her stomach.

You land somewhat softly at the bottom, and you gasp for air, which you actually recieve. You spit out the water in your lungs, coughing and wheezing. You guess that the mermaid filtered the water into her breathing, leaving her stomach with air. You start to gag when you feel something bang around you. You then hear Paisley's voice. "Don't you dare throw up in my stomach, human!"

You spit out a bit but try to hold the vomit. "Paisley! Let me out!"
1112.title: Salty Sea Snack

11121.content:
The stomach rumbled around, knocking you off balance, as she giggled. "No way! I warned you before, morsel. If I see you in the water, I get a delicious snack!"

You groan and try to regain your balance , only to lose it shortly after. You swear under your breath, try to get a grasp on the situation. Suddenly, a warm sensation nips at your body. You look around to see a liquid forming. Her digestive acids kick in.

Perhaps, you could slam against her stomach toescape. It'd require a lot of energy, draining you of all of it if it were to work. Though,Paisley might just eat you again after seeing you sapped of your stamina.

Or you could accept your fate as her meal. After all, you were told to stay out of the water. Besides, as much as you may hate the mermaid, it might be nice you made a monster's figure better (even if that monster is your enemy)
11121.title: ''No way!''

11122.content:
"What do you mean maybe?!" you shout.
"I mean I might let you out, or I might not." This was going nowhere, so you sit on the fleshy floor of this mermaid's stomach and wait for her decision. The entire space around you was soft, and incredibly warm, but also had the pungent odor of fish and was constantly churning. She finally got you after all this time...its days like these which make you want to stay in bed.
***
<Paisley POV>
As the giant mermaid continued through the water, she was thinking about what to do with you. She felt an amazing feeling of euphoria from catching you, and just feeling your presence inside of her sent shivers down her spine. You were the best prey she ever had. But...she also didn't want it to end. It was fun trying to chase you down and gobble you up, but now that she'd finally done it she realized no other prey could give her this feeling. She would be willing to let you out if that could continue...but you would likely stay away from her after this.
"Hey in there..."
***
<Your POV>
"Well? Am I free to go, or am I going to die in here?"
"That depends on your answer. I have a proposal, if you swim in this part of the ocean everyday, no matter what, I'll let you go now and everytime I would catch you. But, if you miss even a single day, I'll eat you for real. Sound good?"
11122.title: "Maybe...."

11123.content:
"O, I will...just not yet." Paisley said coyly. "Just relax until then."

You feel things shift and you guess the giant hourglass shaped mermaid with short primrose colored hair and the tail of a purple tiger shark is heading bach to the underwater grotto near the beach she lives in.

You sit down and shutter at the thought of being crapped out, it was all you could do in this position. Suddenly a horrible noise sounded all around you and everythink started to jerk and spasm before you were sent flying up and landed on something soft as you were tossed throught the air.

She had spat you back up?! What was more, you were in a clamshell-shapped bed big enough for you with a sugar-pink colored cusion for the tounge.

"See? I told you I'd let you out, sweetie." Paisley cooed.

SWEETIE?! What the hell?! You turn to look up at Paisley’s smiling face. "What?! But...but...but...you..."

She laughed "I know my favorite food are humans and that I'd warned you that if I saw you in the water, I’d gobble you up...but this is so much more fun. Do you remember the time we first met?"

Remember? How could you ever forget? There had been an oil spill that day and Paisley’s nature as an aquatic monster had left her trapped. You'd taken a boat with a net and swam out after her, nearly drownding in the sludggy oil, and wrapped her into the net of the boat and used it to haul her to shore and help her clean up before the oil killed her.

The events of that day was why she was fair enough to warn you to stay out of the water.

But to think she'd fallen for you? That was nuts!

Paisley smiled at you and closed the clamshell, trapping you inside. "Just stay there...Mama's been wanting yo meet you and she's a wedding planner anyways, so it all works out at once." she cooed, picking up the clamshell and cuddeling it.

WEDDING PLANNER?!

Ok...all of a sudden, you wish she'd ment to eat you!
11123.title: undersea infatuation

choices: Switch to Roxy looking for Stephen on the Beach
111231.content:
You're shivering at the thought of the idea of marrying Paisley, a mermaid that tried to eat you ever since you came to Terrordale. You didn't know what you were thinking when you rescued her from that oil spill. You wish you had been out sick that day.

As if things weren't bad enough, you hear splashing and a second mermaid comes in, Paisley's mother. She was the same height as Paisely and looked identical except her hair was a grayer shade of purple, she was wearing glasses and had the tail of a great white shark. "Here he is mother," says Paisley cheerfully.

Paisley's mother adjusts her glasses and looks down at you with a smile before poking you in the chest and making him grunt. "My, my," she says. "You snagged a good one here Paisley honey, I've never been able to catch a specimen in this good shape." You look closer at her lips to see that Paisley's mother had lips that were red as blood, most likely human blood.

"You must be this Stephen I've heard so much about," she says. "I'm Ithica." "Icky is more like it." You think to yourself in your head." Ithica then sticks out her tongue and licks you slightly and makes you yell. "Terribly sorry about everything. But I'm sure you already new of all the monster races, mermaids are one of the top ten predators to the human race." "I figured," you say. "I know that all two well." Paisley then looks down on you with a cat's smile. "Normally all humans are prey, but since you saved me that day despite the danger I posed to you. I'm letting you live. As my husband."

HUSBAND! This was bad. "We make preparations for the wedding right away," says Ithica as she holds up her tail. "Oh and Stephen, Paisley is my only daughter. If you jade her at the alter..." Ithica shows you her razor sharp shark's teeth and you shudder in place.

This is the worst situation you had ever gotten into. This was worse than the time Hannah duct taped you to April's butt or when Kath accidentally used you as a paintbrush. You were now engaged to your worst enemy and nobody on the beach knew where you were. You're really wishing you had been eaten.
111231.title: This is not Good

choices: She looks for you in the water
She asks April if she's seen you
1112312.content:
While you were in this unpleasant situation, Roxy had just arrived to work on the beach and was looking around for you. "Stephen?" she asked. "Stephen? Where could he be? I really hope he didn't go swimming with Paisley out there." Roxy even flies into the air as she scanned the beach for you.

Roxy was the best friend you had in Terrordale and had saved your life hundreds of times. You had heard gargoyles were very loyal to their friends. It was no surprise she was a lifeguard since gargoyles mainly wind up in security type jobs. Roxy was so worried she was biting her nails.

But then she ran into someone she'd rather avoid. Stella, a blonde haired butterfly fairy and a rival to the two of you. Stella was obnoxious towards humans and treated you like less than a bug. She was also rude towards Roxy despite Roxy being more than twice her height. The only reason Roxy didn't put that pest in her place was because she'd be fired if she did.

"Hey Fatty," said Stella. "Where's your pet worm?" Roxy let out a grunt. "I don't have any time to deal with you today Stella. I'm looking for Stephen. If he's not on duty soon Fran might fire him." "No skin off my wings granite breath, maybe Paisley finally ate him." "You're a real piece of work, you know that. He is your coworker." Stella let out a laugh. "He's nothing more than a seeing eye dog to a gargoyle too fat to see her own toes. That proves I'm the better lifeguard." Stella sticks out her tongue and flies away as Roxy gives her a glare.

"That's funny Stella. If someone ripped those wings of yours off and shoved them down that smart mouth of yours you'd be nothing more than a giant human." But Roxy doesn't have time to deal with Stella and instead continues her search for you. But how does she do this?
1112312.title: Roxy's P.O.V.

choices: You and Roxy go investigate the pollution problem.
You and Roxy go to the bar for a drink
Paisley finding some human pray out in the ocean (Paisley's POV)
1113.content:
The speed of Paisley (since she is a mermaid and in the water) was no joke in any sort of way, and at the end... you end up getting caught when she flings you into the air with her tail, and then she then goes underwater, and then jumps up with her mouth open. You know this moment was about to happen, your life was flashing before your eyes, and then suddenly... something was seen flying at a quick speed, and it grabs you. Paisley ends up missing her target and hits the water again, but not before saying. "GOD DAMNIT!!!! You could have made a great meal."

You were in the hands of your partner Roxy (the gargoyle girl) and she had a smile on your face as she flies you back to the beach. "Just going out for a swim?" Roxy asked. "Of course... and I owe you, for saving me... maybe a drink at the bar later on." you replied to her, and she blushes. "Sure thing!" Roxy replied, and then she flies back to the beach area and then she walks to her office (Roxy and you share the same office).

"Say... I wonder, there has been something suspious lately in the ocean, like a pollution or so... and I was hoping you and I can look into it later." Roxy asked you. "Sure thing..."

Where do we go from here?
1113.title: Barely!!!

choices: Yes, you make it out normally
No, Susan manages to stop you
11132.content:
"...but first, I need to calm down after almost getting eaten. Why don't we head over to the bar now?" You suggest. After that close encounter with Paisley, you needed to unwind.

"Alright, but we check the pollution later." Roxy replied, before heading off with you still in her hand.

You reach the bar and get a seat at the counter. Roxy orders a White Russian for her and you get a simple beer. As you wait for your drinks, you decide to ask Roxy about the pollution.

"Well, apparently there's some sort of gunk in a small pool near the eastern cove. A female werewolf touched and got incredibly fat and... oh no. Not her." Roxy says, looking at a nearby booth. You follow her gaze and see what was wrong.

At the both was an incredibly fat chimera in a blue one piece. She had three heads: a bald hippo with blue eyes and grey skin; a bald snake with orange eyes and black scales; and a light grey furred panther with short red hair and black eyes. Her body was an anthro panther with a snake for a tail. All three heads were staring in your direction.

You recognized her as Susan. She was always at the beach, but not for sun or surf. She was a stalker, and the target of her obssession was Roxy. You heard that she was always watching Roxy and even stole and wore some of her swimsuits. You also heard that she even had a shrine to her in her home. You had to deal with her a few times because she got violent if anyone talked to Roxy. Each head had a different personality and appetite: the snake was shy and a vegan; the hippo was sane and ate cooked meat; and the panther, the one you were most afraid of, was completely insane and ate humans.

"Crap, and today was going so well." You say, unhappy.

"I know," Roxy replied. "Maybe we can get out and away from her."

You both take your drinks (which had just arrived) and started for the door. Do you make it?
11132.title: The Stalker

111321.content:
Roxy manages to give Susan the slip and the two of you are out the door before either of you know it. Roxy and you quickly swallow your drinks and give a size of relief (followed by a loud belch in Roxy's case) right before Roxy flaps her wings and flies up. "That was too close for comfort," says Roxy. "That Susan Carvonis drives me so crazy with her relentless stalking." You let out a scoff as Roxy places you in her pitch black hair. "Welcome to my world. Let's check out that pool and we'll see what's up with that mysterious pollution."

Roxy flies over a small grotto by the bay and lands on the docks to get a closer look. There was a strange magenta-colored fluid in the water. “Uh-oh,” you say. “There it is. And its seeping into the cove. Roxy nods her head and then notices some drift wood before getting an idea. In no time at all, your gargoyle friend builds a dam to stop the flow of the polluted water into the bay. “That should keep the damage under control.” As Roxy says this, she fails to notice her tail has touched the polluted water.

Then your gargoyle friend takes out a vial and then uses it to take a sample of the pollutant. “If I didn’t know better,” said Roxy. “I’d say this stuff was nebutori or something similar. But it only seems to effect monsters who touch it. I’ll take it to Helga in the morning and she’ll be able to tell me what this slime if. For now, we better block off this area before it spreads into the beach.” As Roxy says this, you slide down into her hand. However, you notice something strange. Roxy’s palm seems bigger to you. “Roxy?” you ask. “Are you getting bigger?” Roxy glares down at you as her eyes glow red. “Excuse me?” she asks. “Uh, never mind.” “That’s better.” Roxy then places you on her left breast and then walks off to put up some signs.

Meanwhile, back at the bar, Susan sat her enormous rear down on three stools before she pounded her fist to catch Mesa's attention. "Three white Russians." Says the hippo head calmly. Mesa gives Susan her order and Susan's three heads guzzled every last drop. The snake head hissed and sprung up to look around for any sign of Roxy. "Ssshe wasss here." Susan angrily scratched the side of the table and the panther head gave an angry growl. "It's that Stephen boy isn't it?" Susan asked to herself using her panther head. “How dare you toy with my emotions by hanging around someone who doesn’t deserve you? You will be mine, my chubby lemon of my eye. If I have to, I’ll drop that invader down my throat.” Susan then grabs a handful of hot wings and stuffs them into the mouth of her hippo head right before her snake head swallowed an entire flask of gin.

It was at that moment, another monster came in. This one was a decrepit looking male jabberwock with a catfish-like face and pitch black eyes along with a thick fu-manchu mustache. He was hunch-backed and was wearing an old-fashioned red and white striped bathing suit like people wore in the early half of the 20th century. He snuck his way up to Susan and Susan’s hippo head noticed him. “You’re late.” The jabberwock took out a bottle of grape soda and poured himself a glass before he hissed and spoke. “What do you expect from me? I’m old.” Then Susan showed her claws to the jabberwock. “Did you bring it.” The jabberwock gave a growl and held up a heart-shaped bottle filled with pink liquid floating in it. “This is it. Just a slip of this love potion into the gargoyle’s drink with a piece of your DNA and she will fall deeply in love with you.” Susan’s three heads smiled wickedly and then Susan took the potion.

The jabberwock gave a growl. “What about my money?” The panther head roared ferociously at the jabberwock. “I’ll pay you only if the plan succeeds. Only after Roxy is mine. Only after Roxy is mine. The jabberwock nervously nods his head before Susan tosses him to the side. She then gives a growl before she tries to put her fiendish plan into action.

That night, you were staying at Roxy’s house and were standing on her shoulder as she was getting ready to watch a Corona Poe movie. “Hurry up with that sandwich, Roxy. I want to get on with the movie. Corona Poe is my favorite.” Roxy was in her kitchen putting together the type of sandwich that would put a Dagwood to shame. “I’m coming. I’m coming. Ouch!” Roxy bumped her head on the ceiling fan and grumbled. “Who lowered the ceiling?” she asks herself. You look in the kitchen and see that Roxy appears taller. Sure, Roxy was already the size of a skyscraper, but something was bugging you.

What neither you or Roxy noticed was that Susan was outside the window and her snake head placed the love potion vial in her mouth before she slinked in through Roxy's window. Suddenly there is loud music coming from the DVD you're watching and it startles her, causing her to drop the love potion right next to the bottle of pollutant that Roxy had on the windowsill. You turn your head but the snake head retreats, causing you to turn your attention back to the movie.

Susan's snake head then grabs what she believes is the love potion and then slinks her head, uncorks the bottle and pours it into the Olympic swimming pool-sized cup of pink lemonade that Roxy had on the table, retreating once Roxy comes out of the kitchen with her sandwich. You see her butt coming in and you have to jump off the couch onto the table to avoid getting flattened. Surprisingly, Roxy seems to take up the whole couch. She doesn't appear any fatter than usual but she definitely seems to have gotten bigger. You'd almost swear she looked taller than her sister Petra. You decide to shrug it off as Roxy is pouring salt on her sandwich. "Roxy," you say. "That sandwich is big even by your standards." "Are you saying I'm fat?" asks Roxy in annoyance. "No," you say. "I'm saying that you'd probably have to dislocate your jaw just to take a bite."

Roxy gives a scoff right as the movie starts. From the looks of it, it's a western-style movie. "I see we're watching a western tonight." You say as Roxy is trying to bite into her oversized sandwich. "Well," says Roxy. "Corona Poe is a bison-based minotaur. This is one of her first movies. Dances with Wendigos." As the movie opens up in the middle of a large open plain at night, Roxy takes a sip of her tainted pink lemonade as Susan watches and then gags and coughs.

"Roxy?" you ask. "Are you alright?" Roxy then feels her stomach. "Ugh. I think this lemonade has.. (hic!)" Exactly what was it that Roxy drank.
111321.title: Susan's Plot

1113212.content:
You turn your head and you see the vial of the pollutant empty and on the floor. Susan had dropped it. You gasp as Roxy holds her stomach in pain. "Roxy," you say. "You drank that sludge from the pool?" Roxy gives a groan as her stomach gurgled. "How is that possible?" she asks weakly before letting out a sick belch. "Somebody must've spiked my drink. "I think I'm gonna be sick." Roxy got on her knee and coughed and sputtered before she held her stomach in pain again. "Roxy?" you ask. "Are you...?"

Before Roxy can answer you, you notice that her butt appears to be getting bigger and tears through her jeans, revealing her bright red underwear. "Mother Gaia!" yells Roxy (although you don't know if she's referring to the Greek goddess of the Earth or if she's referring to her actual mother named Gaia). Roxy then looks and see her breasts expanding and tear through her black tank top and making her scream as she holds her expanding stomach before it cracks her coffee table and sends you flying as you land on her girth. Roxy grits her fangs. "Not one word about my weight, Stephen."

Roxy feels her stomach in pain and then stands up and lets out a yell of pain because not only has she bumped her head on the ceiling but her head actually went through the ceiling into her attic. Susan is looking and all six of her eyes pop out of her three heads. "What the heck!?" yells the panther head. "I don't underssstand it," said the snake head. "It was ssssuposssed to make her fall madly in love with me." The hippo head then points to the bottle of potion still on the table and the now empty bottle of pollutant. "Oh no."

Roxy crouches down and then runs out onto her verandah before she screams as the verandah collapses under her massive feet. Roxy stands up and then she feels ripping because her underwear was tearing apart and her tank top follows. "Oh no!" "Roxy?" you ask. Roxy stumbles forward and seems to get bigger in both height and weight as she walks and then she recoils in pain before you tumble down her breast. "Whoa!" As you look up, you see that Roxy is rapidly growing to the point where her breast and butt are being pressed against the type of skyscrapers that are skyscrapers to giant monsters. "Oh no! Oh no! Oh no!"

Around, monsters look in horror as Roxy continues to grow and run out of the way as she keeps getting bigger and bigger. "This must be that pollutant she swallowed," you think to yourself as you try to get a good grip on Roxy's growing, fleshy yellow body. "It's made her even more massive than usual." You then slip and yell as Roxy stands up and folds her wings to cover her booty while she uses her hands to hide her breasts and privates. "Oh no." Groans your gargoyle friend.

By the time the pollutant has taken effect, Roxy has grown to 15,000ft high, making the other monsters look like ants in comparison. Roxy screams as she tries desperately to cover herself. Susan's three jaws drop as she looks up at the titanic gargoyle's massive rear right in front of her. That was when Roxy realizes something. "Stephen!?" she yells. "Where are you?!"

At that moment, you were on Roxy's...
1113212.title: The Amazing Colossal Roxy

choices: Wait for the human ship to come, then sink it
Wait for Stephen to go back into the water
11133.content:
You (now Paisley) are flopping aroung the water with your mermaid like body, trying to find your next prey to eat as Roxy just snatch that human you so wanted. You are really pissed off as that Roxy blew your chance of having a human for an instant snack, and now you are seraching around to find something to eat, and then she begins having these thoughs in her head.

"Man that damn Roxy girl snatch that human that I really wanted for a snack." you muttered to yourself in anger as you dive underwater to let out of your pent up furstration. Then suddenly, it came to her thought. There have been reports that they will be humans coming to Terrordale to check out the place and hang out since there have been reports that a majority of the humans and monsters have now gotten along with each other, and are checking the beach out, so maybe you can sink their ship if they come, or just wait to get your revenge on that one human whole screwed you over.

What is your plan at this moment?
11133.title: Some prey finally...

111331.content:
You think to yourself and then give an evil look as you flip your tail around in the water. "On second thought," you say. "One little human bicky is nothing compared to a whole cruise ship full. They obviously didn't count on a certain, devilishly beautiful mermaid coming for tea. They really should stop throwing newspaper into the ocean." You lick your lips before diving back down into the water.

Soon, you saw it from underneath the ocean where you make your home. "The Bravest", the only cruise ship that would take humans to monster territory, up on the lido deck, the passengers were all so blissfully unaware of the titanic mermaid underneath plotting to eat them. They were just partying away and some girls in bikinis were laughing. "I hear the monsters are all super ugly." "Yeah, there's this big troll in charge and I hear she's so dumb, she makes that girl on that hotel show look smart." There were also some drunk men talking about the monsters. "Did you hear about the gargoyle girl?" "Oh man, wouldn't it be great if she looked just like Demona." "I dunno, I hear she's fat. It's that fairy I'm looking forward to seeing." "I dunno," said one of the few sober partygoers. "Are you sure it's safe?" The only ones not thinking about monsters were the children playing on board.

You rub your hands and lick your lips yet again. A prize like this didn't come around that often, this was even better than going after Stephen. But you needed a plan. "Now, now," you say. "I know I'm not a siren, but a mermaid's voice should be hypnotic enough to sink the Bravest. Or, I could just go the barbaric way and as the Americans say, rock the boat. Decisions, decisions."

What do you do?
111331.title: Sink or Supper

choices: Someone intervenes! An old friend perhaps?
Poor sad and alone mermaid has no friends! Go to face justice!
1113311.content:
You reason to yourself that your an attractive mermaid, you could easily draw them over to the rocks with your singing. With little effort as well! So with that though in mind you head towards one of the more dangerous sections to sail on and begin your song... Just as you do a stone gargoyles claw reaches around your neck. "What exactly do you think your doing?" Roxy snarls at you.

Just your luck the rock-bitch would interrupt you AGAIN. "Nothin'..." You respond weakly and she continues to snarl at you, tightening her grip. You'd try to swim away, but you were beached on the rocks and you new from experience a gargoyles grip was as tough as iron. "Really?" She asks "Because it looks to me like you were attempting to lure the ship I was sent to guard over to this boat trap." She states. It was over for you this time, you had no where to run and you were caught red handed.

If only someone were to come help you and hold her off while you escaped... But who on earth would be willing to do that for you?
1113311.title: Siren Song

choices: You Enjoy Your Meal in Peace
One of the lifeguards shows up
1113312.content:
You have your plan and immediately, you swim around in circles underneath the Bravest. The movements of your large bottom whipping up waves that shake the huge cruise ship as everyone screams. "What's going on?" "It's a tsunami!" "Everybody stay calm," says the captain. "Everything will be alright. You then decide to further shake up the boat by swinging your mighty tail and causing the bottom of the ship to crack.

Everyone is screaming, knowing full well that the Bravest was getting ready to break apart violently. But the captain immediately runs to the radio to make contact with Gravefield Beach. "This is the Bravest calling Gravefield Beach! Our ship is caught in the middle of... a hurricane? a tsunami? I'm not sure what you call it! Something is happening." You let out a scoff underneath the ship. "Yeah," you say. "A mermaid with a considerate appetite for human crumpets." On the ship, the beach manager, Fran the troll has managed to make contact with the Bravest. "Remain calm. Fran send lifeguards as soon as they available."

You let out a laugh. "Good luck troll," you say. "No lifeguard will keep me from my feast." You swing your mermaid's tail and strike the bottom of the Bravest, sending several passengers down into the water. One of them who cannot swim starts to sink down and sputter before he sees your face smiling evilly at him and gasps, blowing bubbles out of his mouth. That's all he can do before you bite down on him and eat everything under his neck. You moan in pleasure before you slurp up his head. "I just love free samples. Now to move on to the rest of my meal."
1113312.title: Rock the Boat

choices: The Titanic like ship fires its cannons on you (it's armed)
The Titanic goes down and all of its people with it.
11133121.content:
Terror is now the last thing that people will be witnessing as you begin to devour the remaining people on the ship without remorese as you now rise out of the water, revealing yourself to the many people who are fleeing for their lives, then you let out a loud shriek to freeze everyone in fear. A little girl screamed as you grabbed her and then you eat her up like she was nothing. In about 5 minutes, everyone on the ship was eaten, and then you swing your tail at the ship and breaks it in half, and then it sinks into the ocean.

"Hahahahahahahahahaha!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!" you yelled out evilly. "I have eaten and killed some humans and had them as my meal, but of course that was just an small course meel, as I now see some big fish coming in." as you now head towards another ship (which is the size of the Titanic) and gets ready to eat them.

What happens now?
11133121.title: You Enjoy Your Meal in Peace

choices: Attack the ship, you're still hungry
111331211.content:
As you swim forward, ready for another meal, this Titanic style ship moves towards Gravefield Beach. The captain of the ship looks through a pair of binoculars and gives you a scowl. "Get the cannons ready men," he says. "That mermaid sunk the Bravest, but we're ready for her." Aye, aye, captain." As you come forward, you hear a clicking and much to your surprise, a pair of missile launchers appears on the sides. "Bloody hell!" you yell. You're forced to duck into the water as the missiles fly over your head. Once you're under the water, you turn your head to see the bottom of the ship has a laser cannon that takes aim and launches a beam that burns the tip of your fin.

You scream and blow on your tail before you swim back. "Oh bugger," you say to yourself. "Now that's just not playing fair. And I'm still hungry. Then again, am I really that hungry." The titanic ship then clicks again and you hear a noise like a loudspeaker. "We know about you Paisley. You're that mermaid the beach manager is always complaining about. I don't understand why they don't just kick a parasite like you out of these waters." "Parasite? How rude. I am a mermaid, the most beautiful type of monster in or out of the water and you humans are at the bottom of the food chain." "Go ahead," said the captain on the speaker. "This ship has two hundred passengers not including myself and my crew and is armed to the teeth. You try to attack our ocean liner and it will be your last meal."

This wasn't a good situation at all. What do you do know?

(Note, if Paisley gets killed, switch P.O.V. back to Stephen)
111331211.title: Armed Ship

1113312111.content:
You realized that they are serious when they are armed to the teeth, and they weren't joking in any sort of way at all, so you had no option but to retreat, so you swimmed away as far as your mermaid body can take you. "Yeah!!!! That's right... run away you bitch... don't ever come back to eat us again!" a passenger yelled at the mermaid girl. "Fuck you bitch!!!!!!" said by another with 2 middle fingers shown. The passengers then got back to party and visiting as they head to the beach for the... "proper" departure to Terrordale.

(I know this chapter is short, but honestly... I am kinda having a lack of ideas... so who's POV should we go to now?)
1113312111.title: That's right... run away!

choices: Go back to your Grotto for a nap
11133121112.content:
(For now, we're staying with Paisley's POV. This was a good idea UltraGTS. A good route.)

You swim away pouting as that cruise ship makes its way to Terrordale and you let out a huff. "I do so hate it when I'm outsmarted by prey. This is the worst. Warships coming to Terrordale. Anti-Mermaid warships. It's getting so a mermaid can't get a bite to eat, except for bloody kelp. I'm not a seahorse. But what am I to do. I've lived in these Terrordale waters so long, they've started to expect me. I even heard that blasted troll threatening to call somebody to put me in a wretched aquarium. They really can't see anyone in the water as a superior species."

You're so frustrated that you swim upside-down as several whales pass you. Of course, they're the size of dogs compared to you and you even stroke one on the head as you let out a sigh. You then feel your stomach and see bumps. It would appear the humans you ate earlier weren't being cooperative. But you let out a pleasured moan. "Oh, yes, do struggle. I do enjoy that feeling." But then you let out another sigh.

Then you begin to wonder. "Maybe there's some human crumpets on the other side. Come to think about it, I've never been in Horrorville territory. But then again, Horrorvilles and Terrordales are natural enemies. What to do, what to do?"
11133121112.title: One Miffed Mermaid

choices: You go for R.L. (to spark war)
The Horrorville Alarm goes off. you been detected
111331211121.content:
"I know somewhere that has humans... maybe Horrorville will have my needs." you smiled to yourself as you eat a couple of fishes and sharks for food as you now head towards your next location... the Horrorville territory, where Terrordale and Horrorville have been the closest of enemies that you can ever imagine. Heck... they say that if any human or monster from Terrordale or Horrorville entered in either territory.... they would start a riot right then and there.

/

At the Horrorville Waters

We now go to where we see R.L. (read Monster Arms for more details) and a couple other monsters (Petra, Candace, Chel, and Izzy were all presented.) as they were preparing a ship for R.L. to go to Terrordale. Here is kinda of an alternative story... R.L. is right now trying to work on a peace deal with the master of Terrordale so that war can be defused, and he has to go himself to ensure there is no problems, so he gets on his boat and says his goodbyes to the monsters behind him before he goes out into the ocean.

What happens now?
111331211121.title: R.L.'s Return....?

choices: Monsters From Horrorville cross into the beach
1113312111211.content:
"You are so mine R.L., they will for sure be riot, that's for sure, and I will be the one that is causing it today." Paisley said with a sinister smile on her face just as she approaches under the boat, and then with her mouth straight open, she eats the boat without any remorse, and sadly... R.L. was nowhere to be seen, and he didn't saw it coming, and is now heading towards Paisley's gigantic stomach. The alarms go off, and the Horrorville army attempts to stop her, but she gets away like Sonic the Hedgehog.

/

Monster Shore News

"Horrorville just has declared war on Terrordale as of today because of the monsters from Terrordale, killed Horrorville's peace ambassador, and as a result... the feud has gotten worse... all citizens near the Horrorville Terrordale line should be prepared to fight of their lives." you said as you read the newspaper to everyone, and every single monster gasp in terror just as they panic of the upcoming war. "Oh no... we have to go to war... this sucks!!!!!" Chihiro complained.

What happens now?
1113312111211.title: You go for R.L. (to spark war)

choices: Roxy! Terrordale has pushed back the attackers!
A strange red dragoness... Horrorville has claimed the beach.
11133121112112.content:
Back to Stephen's POV!

You thought ordinary monsters were a both horrifying and terrifying sight (See what I did there?) but these things... They were bred for war. Gargoyles standing several heads taller than your friend Roxy, humungous dragons with smoke pillowing from their nostrils and eyes red with hatred and anger. Within almost an instant the people of Terrordale were scattered, running for their lives or lying ominously still upon the beach in pools of red liquid. Roxy grabs you and runs, but you are separated when a blast of fire knocks her over and you out of her hand.

Before you have a chance to react Stella is killed in front of you and her body falls atop you, covering your corpse. Ironic, you think to yourself as her weight begins to press upon you, I always knew she'd be the end of me... You think to yourself. However, it appears she wont be as she has only pressed you into the sand concealing and trapping you yet not crushing you.

You spend a while held under her corpse and hear the fight go on, with the military forces of Terrordale finally arriving. However you cannot discern who the victor is... Eventually you feel something moving the body above you. Light shines in and you see the face of...
11133121112112.title: Are you happy now Paisley?! ARE YOU HAPPY?!

choices: Try and Catch Paisley as a Peace Offering
111331211121121.content:
You look up and see Roxy smiling down on you as she holds up Stella's corpse. You let out a sigh. "Thank goodness it's you Roxy." You say. "How ironic," says Roxy. "Ultimately Stella saved your life. As much as I hate to admit it, I hope she rests in peace." You feel yourself and see that you're covered in a bizarre blue liquid and see the same liquid leaking out of Stella's back. You mentally gag because you're covered from head to toe in fairy blood.

You see that most of the beach has been destroyed and several of the monsters from Terrordale (including Mesa, Chihiro, Reimu and even Fran) receiving medical attention. "What happened?" you ask. Roxy lets out a sigh. "After Horrorville attacked, the Terrordale army managed to fight back. Not easy since we were up against mostly dragons and gargoyles. But they will be back. They were out for blood." Opal lets out a hiss as she's gluing the gem on her forehead back together. It must've been broken in the fight. "This is all Paisley's fault!" she yells. Fran nods her head as her daughter Helga bandages her. "Fran hate Paisley! Paisley eat peace ambassador! Paisley bad mermaid!" Then Fran holds her arm in pain, prompting Helga to sit her down. "Mom," Helga says. "Don't move around too much. You'll reopen your wounds."

You look and see that some of the monsters from your Winter job at Grimmsly Lodge showed up, namely Roxy's bahamut friend, Elisa, a giant monster resembling a hippo with gills and dragon's wings. Accompanying her and tending to the injured were Azure the werecoyote, Hippolyta the hippogriff, Victoria the Frankenstein, Felicia the werejaguar and Lydia the kamaitachi. Even Dr. West and Nurse Whitney from the K.D.P. are there. "Normally," says Dr. West. "I'm not this kind of doctor. But we need everyone we can."

Whitney let out a sigh. "And the K.D.P. was destroyed in the attack. All the patients got loose. As if there wasn't enough chaos all around us at the moment. Kath, bring more antibiotics, we've got more heavy injuries here."

Elisa comes forward to speak with you and Roxy. "Things really got pear shaped over here," she says. "At least you guys are okay." Roxy hands you to Elisa and then walks away. "Elisa," she says. "Please hold onto Stephen for me while I take Stella to the morgue." Elisa nods her way as Roxy walks away. "This is just great," says Elisa in annoyance. "I finally get Edgar to agree to a date this weekend and then a war breaks out. That Paisley did it this time." "At this rate," you say. "We're all gonna get killed. Except for those who are undead." Elisa walks into a tent that appears to be arranged like a war room. There were several monsters under the tent. Only one of them you recognized and you didn't like it. It was Elektra, a loxodon waitress for Grimmsly Lodge in the winter. That elephantine giantess was also trying to eat you during the winter just like Paisley does in the summer.

However, as Elektra looks at you, she just lets out a sigh and lowers her trunk. "I don't have time to eat you at the moment Stephen," she says. "We've got bigger fish to fry. Literally." "Elektra?" you ask. "What are you doing here?" "What?" asks Elektra. "I used to be a soldier. I'm a war elephant." You groan at that joke before a black furred Nemean lion slams his hand on the table. "We barely won with our lives. The Horrorvilles will be back later. Our defenses can't take another assault. We've got to take the fight to them." Every monster in the tent except for Elisa and Elektra roar up in agreement. "We can't do that," says Elisa. "Roxy's sisters live in Horrorville. Not to mention some of April's cousins. We're twin cities for crying out loud!" "Shut up Starking," says Elektra. "This is war Elisa." "But there has to be a better way!" yells Elisa as the hippo dragon giantess opens her mouth and shows her sharp teeth. "This is Paisley's fault we're in this mess. She's the killer. I have an idea. What if we were to capture Paisley and hand her over to Horrorville."

You nod your head as you sit in Elisa's palm. That was a good idea, it was all Paisley's fault. She ate R.L. and threw Horrorville and Terrordale into this mess. You'd want a part of any plan that would give Paisley what's coming to her.

But what is the ultimate decision?
111331211121121.title: The Gameplan

choices: You make it back to your grotto
1113312111212.content:
You see the boat carrying R.L. and then you try to go in for the kill. But it would appear that this was not your day because your tail touches a red laser beam and then you hear an alarm blaring. "Oh dash it all." You moan to yourself. Up above, R.L. heard something and then walked up to the side of the boat to see you swimming in the water. R.L. takes out a phone to contact his monster friends. "Hello," he says. "Petra." "What is it R.L.?" "I think there's someone right below me. It looks like a mermaid."

On the beach, that gargoyle Petra grits her teeth angrily. And you thought Roxy was a pain in the neck, this gargoyle was much bigger and in better shape. Petra turns to Chel and another giantess, Widget, a Franeknstein, and gives a stern look. "It's that Paisley mermaid my sister warned me about. That bitch is going to make the feud even worse. Even Lupa wouldn't eat a peace ambassador." Cadence, that zombie giantess lets out a groan before Petra walks up to Chel and Widget. "You two, come with me. That mermaid just swum her last."

In the water, you're swimming like the devil to escape from the gargoyle and the other monsters who would come after you. "Bad day, bad day, bad day. Oh, blast, oh blast. What do gargoyles have against me anyway?" If Petra, Chel or Izzy caught you, you'd be in serious trouble. They might even put you in an aquarium.

All you can do is swim, swim, swim. But is it enough for you to get away.
1113312111212.title: DETECTED!

11133121112121.content:
As you continue to swim for your life, Petra takes out a gun and shoots at you as Widget fires lightning bolts. It's a heavy barrage and you're forced to zigzag to get out of the way as the bolts go off like bombs. One of Petra's bullets even hits you in the tail and makes you yell in pain. But you couldn't stop now. These Horrorville monsters were out for blood in the worst way possible.

But soon, you dive down too deep for them to see you. Widget tries to zoom in on your location, but no luck. "Sorry Ms. Petra," says Widget. "The mermaid has escaped." Petra shakes her fist and gives an angry look. "Great! Now we have to reschedule anything! When will the feud end! Cadence, swim out and get R.L. We'll have to try this another time." Cadence lets out a grunt and dives into the water to get her human friend.

Meanwhile, you have returned to your undersea grotto and pant heavily. "Technology like that is going to be the death of me," you say. "If it isn't some uncooperative bickies, it's those bloody Horrorville badgers. It's as if the only thing the Horrors and the Terrors agree on is to pick on little old me. Oh, well." You let out a yawn. "I am bushed." You swim into a giant seashell that makes up your bed and then shut yourself inside as you take a nap.

Where to go now?
11133121112121.title: The Great Escape

111331211121211.content:
During your nap, you started to think of some thoughts over what was taking place the last couple of hours, and how that experience almsot ruined your entire life. That human Stephen is a pain on you when you tried to get something to eat, and worst of all... you were nearly arrested and everything... and now you end up with no humans to eat. You muttered and gittered your teeth in anger as you try to think of something.

"Say... if I cannot eat anything in this world... maybe the human world can be where I can eat something?" she thoughted. You got news that several monsters from the monster world lived in the human world and that they retreated and went into hiding to avoid being detected such as the Loch Ness Monster. Other monsters were referred to as kaiju and made into movie monsters. But thinking about it... maybe you can go to the human world, and start some chaos there instead. You are a mermaid after all, in the water like jaws, to attack prey in the ocean and all.

So... go to the human world? Or get Stephen?
111331211121211.title: Stay with Paisley's P.O.V.

choices: Petra flies down in front of you
111331211121212.content:
Now you're Stephen again. And as you're sitting on Roxy's shoulder, you give a sad look. You had heard about what happened with that cruise ship that Paisley sunk and you and Roxy had been too busy tending to illegal dumping to save them. All those lives lost. Roxy turns her head to you and realizes your pain. "We had no idea what was going on and even if we did, our hands were full at the time. But I agree with you. That Paisley girl is a parasite."

You let out a grunt and cross your arms. "When is Fran going to call the exterminator on her?" "Stephen," says Roxy. "The merfolk were here long before Gravefield Beach and Paisley was the only one too stubborn to move when the beach was founded. I'd like to see somebody make her into sushi."

You let out a laugh and then you get an idea. You wonder if Mesa sells seafood. It would make you feel so good to eat something close to what tries to eat you. Then you remember something. "Didn't Kath just make a painting to honor the fallen ship?" Roxy nods her head. "She put it up in April's shop. Maybe we should see it. Seeing April might put you in a better move." "Yeah right!" you yell. Roxy lets out a laugh and slaps herself in the belly as you shudder at the thought of seeing that yandere werewolf.

What do you do?
111331211121212.title: Back to Stephen

1113312111212122.content:
Suddenly you hear flapping, it sounded similar to the beat of Roxy's wings, but Roxy wasn't in the air at the moment. You and Roxy then look up and you're in complete shock. Another gargoyle was flying down from the sky, but bigger than Roxy. You had heard Roxy had a younger sister in Horrorville by the name of Petra and that Petra was a cop. But younger doesn't necessarily mean smaller, this garg had to be one thousand feet tall. You're in so much fear and then you hide behind Roxy's neck.

Of course Roxy isn't afraid to see her sister. "Petra! Hey you. How's it shaking." Roxy walks up to Petra and gives her a high five and smile. She then gestures to you that its safe to come out, but you're in awe at how taller Petra was than Roxy, she had to have been the biggest monster you've ever seen. Petra then notices Roxy's belly and gives a sly look. "I see you still have those spare tires BIG sister." Roxy lets out a grunt and tried to hide her huge stomach with her wings as you let out a giggle. "Hey Petra," you say. "I'm Stephen, Roxy's partner. What brings you to Gravefield Beach. I thought Horrorville's monsters didn't come this far into Terrordale."

Petra's face then turns into a grim glare. "Your trash is in our waters." "Say what?" asks Roxy. Petra is so miffed she even crosses her arms. "I don't hold anything against you for choosing to move to Terrordale while I moved to Horrorville, but the feud was on the verge of ending once and for all just the other day. What we didn't count on was one greedy mermaid." Roxy lets out a gasp and you scream. "Paisley! What did she do?" Petra was so angry she let out a gargoylish roar. "That freakin' bitch tried to eat the human we sent as the peace ambassador!"

Roxy gives a look of surprise herself. "You're kidding me. She could've caused a war. Thank goodness she's technically not part of Terrordale." Roxy lets out a laugh but her sister is less than amused. "The mayor of Horrorville wants something done about that mermaid. She's a criminal as far as both cities are concerned. Either catch that fish and put her behind glass or evict her and seal in her grotto! I don't care! That mermaid is a menace."

Petra flies off in a huff as Roxy lets out a sigh. "Come on Stephen. We've got work to do."

What do you do about this mermaid Problem
1113312111212122.title: Greetings from Horrorville

choices: Go to her and announce the news
Bring an Army of Giantesses and just beat the shit out of her

Roxy and Stephen knew that they had a task that has to been done for Petra if they want to prevent another incident like this, and that was to remove Paisley from the waters, so in order to do that, they decided to talk to Fran over this entire case. It was a bit of time before Fran had an answer, but one thing is for sure, no one... like Paisley in anyway. "WHAT?!!!!" (sorry if Fran is out of character here, but for the purpose of the eviction) Fran yelled in shock. "Paisley has sure got on Fran's hate list now! Trying to kill peace ambassador, that's just mean!"

"Of course, it's mean! My sister came by and told me about her." Roxy added as she show pictures of what occured last night. "It's bad, that's for sure." you added to prove a point. "Just imagine war breaking out as this rate."

"Fran know... and Fran agree, Paisley has got to go, what she did to humans who came to visit island was unbearable." Fran added as she now goes to her office. For a moment Chihiro came by and asked Fran for a soda (if you don't know who Chihiro is, look up the routes, or better yet... I will tell you right now: http://www.writing.com/main/interact/ite...). "Say... can I have a Bloda X?" Chihiro asked and Fran toss her a soda. "Sure thing." Fran replied, tossing the soda to Chihiro, and then she left.

Both Rozy (sexy name BTW) and you decide to evict Paisley from her ocean water, but how to do it is the question.
11133121112121222.title: Get her out

choices: Petra comes in and congratulates you and Roxy
111331211121212222.content:
A little while later

We see Paisely going through her business at the grotto in the ocean, she was just swimming along like there isn't a care in the world right now, as she looks and preys for anything out in the ocean that is worthy of being digested into her big massive stomach, and boy is it going to be good for her as she has founded a couple of humans in the ocean, and she has gulped them down as if they were like snack bites. "That's enough for one day, need to rest myself." Paisley muttered happily to herself as she goes on back to the grotto, where she is greeted by a major surprise, and what a surprise it is was you, Roxy, (you are on Roxy's shoulder) Chihiro, the surfers Lila Connie, Reimu,Carmen, Hannah; the beachgoers, Kath, Mesa, Opal, Laura, April; and the psychos Natasha, Jen, Eunice, Mira, and Phoebe, all presented at her grotto, and apparently no one is liking her the slightest bit at all. (Won't go into too much detail as I am just going to beat the shit out of her). How you hired all those members, for one big reason reason you told them.

"So you are the one who attempted to assassinate the peace ambassador at Horrorville, and as a result, we have a near war incident, and you... you are going to regret ever doing it, in fact... he's my friend." you yelled at her, and Paisley looks in fear just as all of the monsters has their fists ready and they all were stern at her. "That's right, you fucked with the wrong crew." Mesa grunted (all of them are OOC, but for big reasons).

Then suddenly what we heard, was Paisley screams of terror just as all of the monsters started to beat her up in the most horrific way possible. For starters was getting her to land, and then chopping off her tail fin, etc... and it was just horrific for her, and then eventually... she was dead, and was gone for good. Fran permit this after hearing the news from you of what took place, and she was glad Paisley's gone.

So what takes place now?
111331211121212222.title: She's fucked for good!

1113312111212122222.content:
A few days later, you and Roxy meet with Petra and tell her that the mermaid problem has been taken care of. "I must congratulate your entire beach you two," says Petra with a smile showing her fangs. "Normally I wouldn't recommend murder, but if the authorities caught that mermaid after what she tried to pull, she'd be dead anyway." "Good riddance," you say as you eat some sushi Mesa had made from Paisley's tail. "Stupid mermaid trying to eat humans all the time. I hope she's in hell being roasted on a spit."

Petra then takes a look at Roxy eating the same sushi and gives a look of disgust at her sister. Roxy sees Petra and realizes something. "Oh. Sorry Petra. I know how much you don't like sushi." Petra merely turns her head and sticks out her tongue. "I'm not overly fond of what that sushi was made from. Horrorville and Terrordale are both glad that that evil mermaid terrorist is dead. But I wouldn't rest on my laurels if I were you. Aqua told me that another aquatic monster is moving into Paisley's grotto."

You hear the news and cough in surprise before you slip and fall down into Roxy's cleavage. Roxy then slaps herself in the face. "Terrific. Another sea rat to worry about harassing the beachgoers." You try to stand up, but Roxy's sweat has you stuck to her left breast upside down with one leg in the air. You let out a grumble and try to shake free as Petra spreads her wings out ready to fly. "I advise you keep an eye on this new monster in case they try anything funny. Also Roxy, I'd advise you to spend less time at the beach grill. Someone might think a whale washed up on shore."

Petra laughs at her sister's expense and then flaps her wings to fly back to Horrorville as Roxy grits her teeth. "I am not fat!" she yells. "I have big bones. At least I don't have to duck my head every time I walk through my own front door. Sometimes she drives me so crazy Stephen. Stephen?" Roxy looks down and sees you trying to shake yourself free of her hot sticky breast until she peels you off. "Will you be more careful? That's the fifth time this week I've had to peel you off." "Sorry," I said. "Well, better go check out the new neighbor." Roxy places you in her ear as she flies in the sky right over Paisley's abandoned grotto.

You wonder what kind of monster would move into a dead mermaid's grotto. Especially given how severe Paisley had been killed. First, Mesa chopped off her tail and then Phoebe set her human half on fire as everyone else ganged up on it. You'd have buried what was left, but Carmen ate Paisley's human half and Mesa threw the bones into the trash.

But you can't reflect on the past because you see something swimming out of the grotto. "There she is Roxy!" you yell. "Down there!" Roxy flies down and you both take a look to see that the new resident of Paisley's grotto was....

(not gory peaces, she is wearing a bikini, etc).

I am friendly with all humans. I never eat one at all, I just focus on fishes and fruits. Just came from Horrorville after the whole tensions was defused." You begin to sweat, these Horrorville monsters were already discussing how to kill you, but Petra opens up her wings to startle everyone. "I'm going to talk with my boss, the police chief. You let out a groan before Petra hangs up her phone. "Alright you fish wife," she says. "Your punishment for nearly causing a war is to be sold to an aquarium for the rest of your life." 1113312112.content:
How DARE that pathetic human call YOU a parasite! You think to yourself angrily as you charge the boat. You are going to take special pleasure in killing that disgusting mammal... However in your rage you seem to have forgotten the mighty fire-power the ship boasts. Your ill thought out attack ends almost as quickly as it started, a missile smashing into your gut. You screech in pain and begin to retreat, all thoughts of revenge gone. You have to get out of here, you cant die like this. You were to YOUNG to die like this! To add insult to injury the wound creates a path from your stomach to the outside waters, causing most all of the living inhabitants of your belly to escape. However this seemed to be for the better as your pursers stopped to pick them up. You swam deep into the waters, your eyelids growing heavy with a constant excruciating pain...

Sinking to the soft sand at the bottom of the ocean you lay in agony. You hope desperately someone would come to save you, somehow... No one comes. You die painfully, alone and in the dark. You vaguely reflect in some new found clarity this must be what its like for all those humans you've eaten. However instead of remorse, you feel an intense rage and hatred at the injustice of it all. You were greater than them! Better than them! You didn't deserve to die like one of them!

You hear a voice in your head as it all fades to darkness. "Honestly, I think you got what you deserved."
1113312112.title: You are obviously not the brightest of mermaids...

111331212.content:
You as Paisley feel confident as the second ship comes towards you and you show up just in time for the captain to see you swimming in front of the ship. "Hello." You say as you show your sharp teeth. The captain is so shocked he has a heart attack right there, the passengers on the ship see you swimming forward and scream as you ram the ship, smashing it to bits as every last human on board falls into the water. You laugh wickedly as you swim around in circles to corral them like cattle. One particularly dumb teenager snaps a pic of you with his phone and you make him the first victim of your jaws before spitting out the bones. All the humans try futilely to swim away but you let out a scoff. "Why do they always swim away when they obviously can't escape a creature that spends its entirely life in the water."

You let out a roar and it isn't long before you're spewing out a geyser of human bones. You let out a belch and then pick your teeth with your sharp fingernails. "Now that's what I call a meal, but I'm still hungry. I hope another ship comes along soon. Or at least a succulent fish than I can sink my teeth into." You then hear what sounds like a foghorn and smile fiendishly. "Jolly good," she says. "Good heavens. It would seem that some humans are stupid enough to blow their own horn when there's a dangerous predator in these waters. Time for thirds."

You dive into the water as a tanker ship appears to be coming forward with some strange barrels with Japanese writing on them. One of the men working with the barrels was a man in a blue prison suit who was having a little trouble. Another man on the ship was a tan skinned man with long blonde hair. "A little help here?" asks the man in the blue suit. "What more do you want Diggs?" asks the blond man. "I've got to get ready for the monster girls. I hear there's a mermaid in these waters." "Will you two quit arguing," says the boss of the ship, an elderly looking African man with a graying beard. "Chuck, Diggs, make sure no one can see those barrels. That stuff is illegal to carry." "Alrigth, Ezra," says Diggs. "Don't get your balls in a knot." Chuck lets out a sigh and walks to help Diggs but then sees your tail in the water.

As Diggs and Ezra look in confusion Chuck smiles and walks up to the bow of the ship as you rise your head. "You must be, the little mermaid." Says the blond jokingly. You smile at him and pucker your lips. This gives the buffoon the message to do the same, as your lips are about to lock CHOMP! Ezra and Diggs gasp in fear as their accomplice is devoured. "You Prince Charming wannabes are all the same," You say. "Oh well." The other criminals scream as you slam your head through the ship to break it in half, this unleashes all the barrels at once as they release a strange purple slime. You even swallow some of it. "YECH!" you yell. "What is this garbage? I definitely wouldn't eat it on a crumpet.

You then sniff the water, as it turns out, Diggs got a shrapnel in his leg from when you wrecked the boat and was bleeding. You see him and Ezra trying to swim away and swim after them and it isn't long until you're chewing on their remains.

"What was that strange goop they were carrying?" you think to yourself. "Oh well, I got a good meal out of the deal so why should I think back on something so unimportant. Oh well. Cheerio."

As you swim away you fail to notice the barrels were labeled "Nebutori" and they had already contaminated the water.
111331212.title: Seconds and Thirds

1113312121.content:
As you're swimming away from that wreckage, you let out a belch and hold your stomach. "Ugh," you say as you hold your mermaid stomach. "What was that dreadful slime concoction. It tasted positively awful. Burp. Ugh. And it has made me absolutely gassy. I hope I never run into such putrid ooze again." You decide you've eaten enough humans for one day and decide to retreat back deep thousands of feet under the water. What those surface dwelling monsters didn't know was that there were a large number of mermaids near Gravefield Beach. You were just the only one to surface.

As you're swimming down a street of glowing coral, another mermaid swims up behind you. From the looks of it, she was a mermaid with the upper body of an African American woman and the tail of a parrot fish. She had long brown hair and was wearing a kelp bra as she glared at you. "Paisley!" she yells. "I've got a bone to pick with you." "What the devilfish do you want, Polly?" "Well," says the parrotfish mermaid. "I had a date the other night with a Japanese sailor I met in the human world. He was a no-so and it's all your fault, I'm sure you ate him, you gluttonous bitch." "How do you know it was me?" "It's always you! Every human ship that's come into these waters was sunk because of you." You let out a scoff. "Bloody hell, Polly. I'm hardly the only mermaid who eats humans. There are plenty of other fish in the sea. Literally."

As you swim off, Polly gives you a glare. "I hate shark mermaids. They're always full of themselves." You ignore that parrotfish girl but then you let out a burp and hold your stomach. You then moan as you hear the sound like a shotgun. "Bloody hell," you say. "One of those yummies must've been packing a gun. How annoying. Those disgusting things give me indigestion. Perhaps some medicinal seaweed should settle my stomach.

You swim into what appears to be a mermaid cafe. The proprietress was a mermaid wearing headphones and with long blackish blue hair and she had the tail of a koi fish. "Musa," you say as the proprietress is locked in her music. "Musa." The woman doesn't pay you any heed. "Musa!" you yell at the top of your lungs, startling the koi fish girl. "Oh," says Musa. "Paisley. Didn't see you there." "Enough with the chit-chat, Musa," you say. "Chop. Chop. Caesar Kelp salad." "Salad?" asks Musa as she gets to chopping. "Don't you usually eat humans." There's a dark blonde haired goth girl swordfish mermaid with a dark blue tail and a long nose at the next table and she lets out a scoff. "Humanity must be extinct by now with her appetite." "Shut up." You say.

Musa brings you your salad as another mermaid swims up to you. This one was an auburn haired and red tailed flying fish mermaid. "Hello, Paisley." "Skyler," you mutter. "It never fails, I sit down for something to settle my stomach and in swims the one mermaid who can kill my appetite. Why don't you go to the bar and drink yourself to death?" "Cute," says Skyler mockingly. "Have you caught Stephen yet?" You let out a sigh as Musa gives you your salad and you dig into it. "Roxy saved him against. Bloody gargoyle. If she were down here, I would shove my tail fin up her large and rather unflattering ass. There is a lavender skinned and yellow tailed mermaid resembling an overweight Asia woman at the counter who had the tail of a scorpionfish. She let out a laugh. "That big yellow thing is a gargoyle? I thought she was a whale that learned how to fly."

"Shut up, Arachne," says the swordfish woman. "I'm surprised Paisley isn't as big as that gargoyle with how much she eats." "Gladys," says Paisley. "Just because you haven't had a date in years doesn't give you the right to criticize me, so keep your large nose out of my affairs." Gladys let out a scoff as Arachne laughs and Skyler gives a pout.

That night, you let out a yawn as you swim into your seashell bed. "That Gladys doesn't know what she's saying. I am nowhere near putting on weight." You yawn and go right to sleep. The next morning you let out a yawn but it takes you some effort to open your shell bed and then you groan as you swim out of bed. But as you do, you realize something and feel around your body. "Sweet zombie Triton!" you yell as you realize something.

You don't know how, but now you're...

As she jogged out of the apartment building, she failed to notice her belly expanding.

At the K.D.P. nearby, a bright red-skinned Jersey Devil woman with long pink hair was right outside sweeping up when a wave struck her and covered her in water. The Jersey Devil woman then looked down to see that her bikini looked like ti was tattooed on. As she was trying to figure out what was going on, she bumped into a python gorgon with brown scaly skin, a hook for a hand and an enormous rear that appeared to have gotten even bigger due to the nebutori right before the gorgon girl lost balance and fell down grunting.
