153.content:
"Eunice....." both of you yelled out as she sees the biploar spriggan stirring up a whole heap of trouble right before your very eyes. She was engaging in a cussing fight with Stella, Paisley (this is near the water), and Chihiro was going by to see what the seven gates of hell is going on. "Fuck that fucking bullshit Stella, just because I am a bad looking fairy, doesn't mean I am a fucking disgrace to fairies everywhere... you are a disgrace with you how you are being such a fucking fat ass less worthy of a fucking shit dog. You aren't even a fairy, you are just a fucking whore with a big fat ass potty mouth!" Eunice cussed out just as she punches Stella right in her vagina. Boy was that painful for Stella... as she was on the ground then.

"Dang.... I don't like this at all." Paisley muttered. "I'm out of here!" she said, and then she left to go find a human ship and destroy it and eat its humans. "Eunice... seriously... stop this crap!!!!" Chihiro grunted just as she prepares to go right inside for the fight. "Don't asked me waht to do you fucking nightmare bitch...!" "HEY... you want a picee of me... bring it on, but trust me... I am a nightmare you know!!!!" Chihiro grunted!
153.title: Eunice, the bipolar spriggan

choices: You and Roxy convince her to head back to the institute
154.content:
Cowering underneath an umbrella that was far too small for her giant frame, Mira the golem girl shivered as she nervously took a peek upwards every once in a while. You and Roxy shared a rather sympathetic look. Mira was one of the more tolerable patients that escaped, seeing as how she thought the sky itself was going to crash down on her. It was almost childlike in a sense, and the golem gal never actually hurt anybody whenever she got out. Question was, why does she leave sometimes? One would think that Mira found it safest with a roof over her head. Either she had been coaxed outside, or something forced her to.

Roxy swooped down and landed as gently as she could, the golem shying away from her appearance. "Hey Mira! It's me, Roxy, remember? And I even brought Stephen with me."

"Hey Mira." You wave slowly, trying not to move too fast and frighten her.

"R-Roxy? Stephen?" She slowly peeked her head out from under the umbrella.
154.title: Mira, the paranoid golem girl

choices: You ask why the institute was built on a beach
Dr. West asks you two to oversee group therapy
1542.content:
Despite seeing you both, Mira shakes nervously and you hear it as her clay body begins to clatter. "Come with us Mira," you say. "It's safer in the institute. The big bad sky won't come down on you as long as you're in the nice safe institute. What do you say? You can make the decision yourself. You're a big girl." Mira hesitates and even bites her fingertips before she gives in. "On one condition."

Soon Roxy is holding hands with Mira and holding the umbrella over the golem girl's head. "They don't pay us enough for this," you say. "No where in the job description did it say anything about babysitting loonies." "Be nice Stephen," says Roxy as you two continue to walk down the beach. "We're technically keeping people from getting hurt. Both the beach goers and the patients." After half an hour you three reach the institute and walk inside with Mira. It is there you are approached by the head of the institute, Dr. Kaguya West.

Dr. West was a very shapely kitsune woman. She resembled an Asian woman with violet hair and a slight beauty mark on her face. But she had golden fox ears and nine long tails. Even though she was a psychiatrist, as well as wearing her labcoat she wore a tight ultramarine two piece, if only because of the environment where the institute was located. Fortunately for you, Dr. West mostly ate vegetables and soy despite technically being a carnivorous monster.

There you are Mira," says Dr. West. "Come on, you've had a long day. A little group therapy should do you good. At least you face your greatest fear every time you escape. Thanks you two. I owe you both a big debt. Stephen, Roxy. I don't know how you do it.

"Dr. West," says Roxy. "You have seriously got to beef up security around here. It's lucky it was only Mira this time. Last time Jen got out, she blew up the parking lot." Dr. West lets out a sigh. "Progress is slow," she says. "But remember, these are really sick individuals. We're doing the best we can."

You look around the institute and see that the curtains were charred. Phoebe must've been in a bad mood again. Then you see all nine of Dr. West's tails wagging as she wiggled her large behind. You had to look away. Make her think you're a professional. The institute here dealt with all kinds of crazy monsters. There was a shark girl who was deathly afraid of blood and even a kelpie who was afraid of water. You wonder how Dr. West herself stayed sane dealing with all these lunatics, lunatics as big as buildings to you and you were in a building full of them. That was a scary thought.
1542.title: To the Institute

15421.content:
"Say... it is very strange why in the world this place would be built on a beach, any reasons why?" you asked her. Dr. West wanted to explain why, but doesn't know how to put it, because... they just decided just to put it there, with no rime or reason for it. "Well... sadly, it was just built here, and that is all as I can say at this moment. I need to ask my boss for more details on that... but I can tell you this, it was intended to be built in the city, but since they have been a lot of problems lately with space and all, we had to build it on a beach, but again I ain't sure." Dr. West added.

"Well then I can see why it was built on the beach, space problems, etc?" you replied as Roxy takes you up to her shoulder. "Well... other than that, we must be going." Roxy said, and then she turns Mira over to her so she can do some tests on her. "I will admit though, you are one nice looking kitsune." you said to her, and then Dr. West just blushes, and Roxy smiled. "Well, sometimes you are one nice ladies man. I mean it." Roxy said, and then you two goes off to the beach, and then you meet up with Chihiro, who is looking at a big incident that is occurring.

"What the heck is going on?" you asked. "I don't know, but it's big... I can tell you that. I tried to figure out why, but it was just so much commotion, I couldn't even get in." Chihiro replied. "I will go check up on Fran, you two better handle this (BTW, this is my first day on the job). So I don't know how to handle this."

"We got it from here Chihiro." Roxy said, and then you and her go to see what's going on. What is it?
15421.title: Well.... it's just there."

15422.content:
"Why don't you two oversee group therapy?" asks Dr. West. You hesitate and shiver. While Dr. West was a nice kitsune, you were in the K.D.P. The Kaiju Disarming Plant. The reason the hospital was called that was because it was a mental hospital for monsters who would destroy the human world if they went into it. Last time you checked, there were at least twenty patients. You're so scared you hide in Roxy's cleavage as your partner looks down.

Roxy just gives you a smile. "You don't have to worry Stephen, you have me to protect you remember?" "Oh," you say. "Right. Thanks partner." Roxy smiles and as Dr. West walks you away, an orderly walks up to you. She was a blue bahamut, a monster resembling a cross between a fish, a hippo and a dragon. "Hi Jedda," says Roxy. "What's up?" "Hi Roxy," says the bahamut. "Hello Stephen." You knew Jedda because her older sister, Elisa, was Roxy's best friend (besides you of course). Jedda was friendly like her sister, but you noticed she was staring at you with hungry eyes.

"Right this way," says Jedda as she escorts you and Roxy towards group therapy. Elisa told you that Jedda was a predator and was taking self-help classes to try and give up human meat. She wasn't having much success and that made you nervous. "You know Stephen," says Jedda. "I shouldn't be saying this since I'm married and well... a lesbian... but you look good today." "Thank you Jedda." You say. Jedda lets out a giggle. "In fact, you'd look even better wrapped up in a tortilla with lettuce and tomatoes." You gulp at that thought as the hippo monster blushes. "Oops. Was that out loud."

Well, miraculously Jedda brings you and Roxy to group therapy without eating you up. You look forward to see Whitney, the head nurse already there. Whitney was a giant wererhinoceros with long orange hair and a blue tattoo over her eye. For someone who was even... ahem... more well covered than Roxy, she was beautiful. Too bad she was married. Amusingly enough, you heard her husband was a human.

Whitney wasn't alone however, there were six patients with her. You could identify them because Fran kept a copy of all their records. First of them was Cassandra, a gigantic purple vampire type werebat who was playing with a toy plane. Cassandra's problem was that a head injury regressed her back to childhood. She was the most innocent patient in the K.D.P. but also one of the most dangerous if you were a human because she tended to mistake them for toys.

The next patient was Hazel, a titanic wereskunk who was wrapped up in a straitjacket. Hazel scared you. She was a giant monster version of the Joker and even looked the part with her green hair and chronic slasher smile. She was really plump today which meant she hadn't sprayed for a long time and that meant she was fully loaded.

Then there was Artemis, a purple python, a dragon resembling an actual python with arms and legs. Artemis was a drunk who came to the K.D.P. to get sober. Too bad all that withdrawal has given her a craving for human flesh.

Next to Artemis was Nicole, a nuckelavee, a skinless red horse woman. Nicole was a masochist who was admitted for torturing herself in extremely cruel ways. There was a rumor her boyfriend sent her to the K.D.P. after he caught her about to sit on a chainsaw. Her already gruesome looking body was covered in scars that made her a nightmare to look at.

After Nicole was Paula, an obese rose skinned cyclops wearing a maid outfit. You hear Paula had a serious case of O.C.D. and would throw a nasty tantrum whenever somebody tracked so much as a speck of dirt into the K.D.P.

Finally was Amalthea, a pink and white striped unicorn who was just as obese as Paula. Amalthea was a depressed creature who thought she was the last unicorn and was very suicidal. Unfortunately, she drowned her sorrows by swallowing humans by the handful.

The session was about to start and Whitney adjusts her glasses. "Okay everybody," she says. "We're going to try and reach for the person you are deep inside your minds, buried beneath all the demons in your heads." Hazel smirks and moves her eyes slightly. "Mine's not talking," she says. "Must be a mime." Hazel lets out a psychotic laugh as Whitney rolls her eyes. "Well, that's nice, Hazel." Amalthea lets out a sigh. "What good is nice or naughty?" she asks. "Being a good person doesn't extend your life. We only go through life doing good deeds because we believe it will compensate for the inescapable death."

Cassandra stops playing and runs to Whitney to grab hold of her. "Ms. Whitney," she says. "Amalthea's scaring me again." Whitney lets out a sigh and taps Cassandra on the back before she notices you and Roxy. "Oh," she says. "Roxy, Stephen, how good of you to join us." "Hey Whitney." "Roxy," says Artemis with a smile. "How's it going?" "Hi Artemis," says Roxy. "Congratulations, three weeks sober." Artemis notices you in Roxy's cleavage and flickers her snake's tongue before she licks her lips. "Are you going to eat that?" she asks as she points to you.

You scream and dig down into the cleavage before Amalthea groans. "Artemis gets a snack," she says. "But I don't see anyone bringing me humans." "Nobody is eating any humans," says Whitney as she hands Cassandra a candy bar to calm her down. "Just the thought should be considered a mental disorder." Roxy steps back from Artemis before Paula turns her one eye and it practically pops out of her head. She notices that Roxy's talons are covered in sand and screams.

"You!" she yells. "You're tracking sand all over the floor! I was up from dawn disinfecting this entire hospital! Do you have any idea how filthy a public beach is!" "Geez," says Roxy. "Sorry!" "And that's not even considering what's in the water!" yells Paula as she pulls her hair. "There are syringes in the sea!"

Nicole pulls on Roxy's tail and gives a creepy smile as you look down at her. "Excuse me Ms. Maza," says Nicole. "Are there any great whites in the water. I love to feel the little nippers chewing away at my fingers. Oh, Whitney, can I play with Phoebe tonight? She's gathered all the toilet paper in the K.D.P. for kindling and I want a front row seat of the fire. Just the touch of it on my skin..."

These girls were even more messed up than the ones you were used to chasing. They must be the more psychotic cases in the K.D.P. "Absolutely not," says Whitney. "Nicole, you have a serious mental condition. Feeding it will only make it worse. Take a seat Roxy. Roxy grabs two chairs to sit down on as Whitney continues with the group therapy. You let out a slight snicker that Roxy needs two seats to hold up her weight but Roxy glares down at you and you look the other way.

"By the way Whitney," you say as you look at the ring on her finger. "Happy anniversary." "Thank you Stephen," says the rhino giantess with a smile. "Now, let's carry on girls."
15422.title: Group Therapy

15423.content: Just Great, 2 breakouts in one day. Who is it this time?
15423.title: There's Another Breakout

1552.content:
Avery the chimera(age 27) is unusual, being a cross between a shark(which is obvious with her back/arm fins and shark tail), an octopus(due to her ability to grab onto anything with great strength), and a Yuki-Onna(Snow Woman)(You feel cold when she near. Not enough to freeze to death, but enough so you can easily catch a cold if not prepared.

Powers: Can form and control any kind of water, due to the moisture in the air. Is incredibly strong, being able to piledrive Roxy with some effort. As mentioned, she has a very strong grip due to miniature suckers on her hands. Can turn invisible. Finally, she can breathe underwater.

Description: Other than her animalistic features(See above), she looks like a human woman her age, except only being 300 ft tall.

Personality: This is honestly her weirdest trait. Instead of being quite ferocious(Much like her genetics), she's actually a peaceful giant that sometimes gets out her cell through stealth. Loves music, really wants to see other people, and is afraid of seeing blood.

Why blood? Well you see, although rare, when Avery sees blood, she goes into a rage, roaring "Musha, musha, MUSHA!"
Last time it happened, it took a traq dart powerful enough to kill a dinosaur. ..........Yeah, not a good time.


All-in-all, Avery is a little weird, but hey, everyone's a little weird.


From the Desk of Dr. Kaguya West.

(Before you ask, yes, I want Kaguya to be a supporting character. Human or monster, that'll be the choice of the author.)
1552.title: *Cue the Super Shark Theme*

choices: She takes that as an offense
She is downsided, and you and Roxy steps in.
15521.content:
Suddenly, you see the latest tenant in the water, as she was hanging out with some of the surfers, and even with Chihiro. You and Roxy head over there to see what's up, and so far it looks like Avery is trying to break up a fight between Stella and another monster girl. It was over some money crap, but other than that... she is fine. "Both of you... stop it, please! I like there to be peace in the world, not violence." Avery said, as she (in the water at the time) uses her tentacles to separate the 2 monsters. "What's going on here?" you asked.

"Well this bitch wanted to take my money, all because I didn't hate humans at all. I really like them." The other monster claimed. "Why even listen to this piece of shit anyway... he's a human, fragile, weak, etc." Stella yelled. "Shut up bitch, before I have to rip your mouth straight off!" the other monster yelled.

"The other girl is right, just because she likes a human, doesn't mean that you have to make everyone hate them. They have their own opinions, I personally like humans, as they are just like us when it comes to feelings and mistakes." Chihiro added, separating the two. "Well I don't need to listen to a chimera brat like you, BTW, you are too young to even take this job!!!!" Stella yelled.

How does Chihiro react?

155222.title: Perhaps a Crossover with Monster Bedlam

1552221.content:
As Roxy is flying overhead, she looks down and spots the escaped K.D.P. patient. She was another gargoyle like Roxy and just as fat as she was, except she looked taller and had horns, unlike Roxy. She was a blonde and was wearing nothing but a loincloth and shirt with fishnet stockings.

"Oh no," groans Roxy. "Not that idiot Eartha again." "Eartha?" you ask. "Who's she?" "A no account hothead taking anger management. She practically wrecked Paris after some stupid kid kept taunting her." "But she's a gargoyle," you say. "You're a gargoyle. Maybe you can talk some sense into her?" "Not likely." Says Roxy.

Roxy flies down in front of Eartha and automatically Eartha glares at Roxy. "What do you freakin' want Maza?" Eartha asks rudely in a French accent. "You're in an unusually good mood today." Says Roxy sarcastically. Eartha scoffs and turns to you before she glares. "Traitor." She mutters. Roxy gasps and gets a little annoyed. "I'm a traitor? You're the one who's a disgrace to the gargoyle race. Eating humans? Disgusting."

You quickly run and hide behind the side of Roxy's hair. Normally gargoyles didn't eat humans and according to Roxy this gargoyle did. Eartha poked Roxy in the breast before responding. "For your information, I'm the only gargoyle who knocks what little jerks those humans are. At least they have one thing they're good for. If you were smart, you'd eat that little cockroach on your shoulder right there."

Roxy shakes her head. "I realized just how horrible those humans are after I woke up covered in paint," said Eartha. "That was the last straw." "It was a prank. No reason to lose it and go all Demona on everyone." This was getting nowhere fast. Roxy was losing patience with Eartha by the second and Eartha was as stubborn as ever.

"Get off my case Roxy," says Eartha. "I'm not in the mood for a no account fatty like you." "Fatty?!" yells Roxy getting angrier. "I'm a fatty?! Those thighs of yours could be used as wrecking balls Blondie!" "At least I'm not shorter than my younger sister!" "You don't even have a sister!" "Go to hell Maza!" "Why don't you go to hell Blondie!"

"Uh Roxy," you say. "Calm d.." "You stay out of this Stephen," warns Roxy. "This is between me and broccoli buns here." "I'll eat you alive lemon drop." Says Eartha in response. "I'd like to see you try!" yells Roxy. You've never seen Roxy get so mad before. What could possibly be worse?
1552221.title: Gargoyle vs. Gargoyle

choices: Roxy Escorts Eartha Back To The Hospital
Whitney Suggests Roxy Take Anger Management Classes
15522211.content:
You continue to hide behind Roxy's hair as the tension rises. Peeking out you see that Eartha is glaring at her, both of them ready for a fight. This is bad. Eartha having anger problems is bad enough, but she had to bring Roxy's weight into it. They trade insults a little more until you feel a massive shift as Roxy rushes forward. Eartha must have finally gotten to her. You hold onto her hair for dear life as she slams into the other gargoyle. They grapple with each other while you try to regain balance. "Whats the matter butter ball? Am I too much for you?" Eartha taunts. "Well you've definitely got me on weight. I'd say you're TOO MUCH period!" Roxy spits back. You begin to tremble as the two of them try to overpower each other.

The contest of strength ends when the gargoyles end up falling over into the sand. They land with a powerful boom, sending you flying off of Roxy onto the beach. When you get up and shake yourself off you see an amazing sight. The two of them are rolling around in the sand, clawing and yelling at each other. Its like watching two mountains fight. You are snapped out of it when they begin to roll towards you. The ground rumbles as they get closer and you desperately try to get out of the way. You manage to dive to safety and stop to catch your breath. Suddenly a shadow looms over you. Roxy has Earth pinned on her stomach, and Eartha just spotted you on the sand. With a grin she reaches for you and you make a break for it. Before her hand can grab you Roxy's own hand shoots down and pins it to the ground. As you sigh in relief Eartha elbows Roxy and throws her off of her back. They resume they're brawl while you just try not to get crushed.

Unfortunately the fight heads back your way. You run around trying to dodge the moving arms and legs that move erratically. Out of nowhere Roxy slams a fist into the ground, no doubt trying to hit Eartha. It doesn't hit you but the force sends a shock wave that launches you into the air. When you come down you find yourself headed right for Eartha's massive chest. With a boing you land on her breast and bounce a couple of times. You come to rest in the valley between and look up in time to see Roxy's own rack coming down. She crashes down and you are sandwiched between the boobs of the two gargoyles. They struggle and roll around some more with you being thrown around on their bodies. You wonder when this will end when suddenly a voice calls out.

"Okay, break it up!" the voice says. Roxy is pulled off of Eartha, leaving you wedged in the green woman's cleavage. You can see that Fran is the one who pulled Roxy off. Looking over you see an albino whererhino walking over. Its Whitney, the head orderly at the KDP. She must have been the one you heard. "All right you two, fights over!" she says. "Fine, fatty over there is lucky you showed up." Eartha says. "Oh yeah!?" Roxy shoots back and starts forward before Fran grabs her arm. "Roxy, you calm down." the troll says. Roxy takes a breath and relaxes while Whitney tells Eartha to do the same. Meanwhile you're still unnoticed in her breasts. You begin to call out but Eartha folds her arms in a huff, squeezing her boobs together and trapping you. Everyone begins to walk and...
15522211.title: Gargoyle Catfight

choices: Whitney Suggests An Anger Management Exercise For Roxy Or Eartha
155222112.content:
The monsters all head back to the KDP, with you still stuck between Eartha's boobs. As they walk Whitney brings up the fight. "You two really went at it." she remarks. Eartha gives a huff and Roxy looks away. "Exactly what started it?" Whitney presses. "She wouldn't cooperate!" Roxy says. "Whatever. Butterball there is just mad she lost." Eartha responds. "I didn't lose you over sized melon!" Roxy shoots back. "Roxy. Calm down." Fran says as she puts a hand on Roxy's shoulder. "I think part of the problem is anger issues." Whitney says. Roxy rolls her eyes. "Well I could have told you that. She's an anger management patient." she says. "Actually, I was referring to you as well." Whitney says. "What?" Roxy says. "Well it seems you got a little overly upset when Eartha called you "butterball". Maybe you have issues regarding your weight?" Whitney suggests. Roxy remains silent and frowns. Normally she would get defensive, but it seems she's trying to keep calm in front of Whitney. It doesn't help that she's still a little worked up from the fight. "I think it would help if you would attend a little session at the institute. Just one, to see if it helps."

After some coaxing from Fran Roxy is sitting in a room with Eartha and Whitney. You are still in Eartha's breasts struggling to escape. Eartha feels you but dismisses it as an itch. She's too annoyed to care right now. "Okay, lets get started." Whitney says. "Why are we both here?" Roxy asks. "I think it will help if you two can get a grasp on what makes the other angry." Whitney replies. "Whatever." Eartha says and slumps back in her chair. "Now Eartha, why don't you explain why you're so angry." Whitney says. "I'm not, I just don't like humans. They're annoying and only good for eating." she answers. "How can you say that? Gargoyles are supposed to be protectors." Roxy says. "Yeah, until the ones you're protecting turn on you and torment you." Eartha spits. "Just because one human played pranks on you doesn't mean every human is a pest." Roxy tells her. By this point you've finally righted yourself and have squeezed out of her boobs. She looks down and sees you. "Case in point. They're like bugs. They can turn up anywhere." she says as she pulls you out. She begins to lower you to her mouth but Roxy snatches you away. "What the hell were you doing in there?" she asks you. "I got a little jumbled up in the fight." you explain. "Okay, I think Stephen can sit in on this." Whitney says as she picks you out of Roxy's hand. She takes you over to her chair and sits you on her shoulder.

"I can't believe you were going to eat him!" Roxy says to Eartha. "Are you telling me you've never thought about it?" Eartha asks. Roxy glares at her. "Not that you could use any more to eat." Eartha adds. "Listen you-" Roxy starts before stopping. Whitney raises an eyebrow. Roxy sighs and folds her arms. You are watching it all from Whitney's shoulder, a little amused. Not to mention you have a great view of Whitney's rack. She's massive! Her husband is a lucky man. "So I think if you come to terms with your weight you'll feel better." Whitney tells Roxy. Roxy just looks away. "You know Roxy, you look great. You're a very attractive girl, and your size is one of your best qualities." you offer. "Stephen you're a chubby chaser." Roxy tells you. Whitney chuckles as you feel a little embarrassed. The session goes on for a little while until...
155222112.title: Session Time

1552222.content: What about Mercy, the Southern Belle zombie who doesn't realize she's died and believes the K.D.P. to be a hotel?
1552222.title: Mercy Me

choices: Walk With Her On The Beach
15522221.content:
From your position in the sky you and Roxy see something bright blue on the beach. Upon descending you find that its a parasol being carried by someone. When Roxy lands she inspects the parasol's owner. It appears to be a zombie girl. She's got part of her lip missing, but she's pretty good looking as far as zombies go. Her hair is brown with a white highlight and done up in ringlets. When she was still alive she must have been beautiful. The most striking thing about her though aside from the parasol is that she's wearing a bright yellow dress that looks somewhat out of place. "Hey Roxy, is she a patient at the KDP?" you ask your gargoyle partner. "I'm not sure. If she is this must be the first time she's gotten out, cause I've never seen her before." she says. The zombie is looking around with an air of curiosity. "She looks pretty harmless." you observe. "Well don't be too relaxed. If she is from the hospital we don't what she might do." Roxy warns you.

Roxy walks over to the wandering girl and greets her. "Excuse me miss! What are doing out here today?" The zombie looks at her and smiles. "Oh I'm just enjoying the beautiful day. Its been a while since I've been outside." she says. There is a southern drawl in her voice. "So how did you come by our beach?" Roxy asks. The girl gives a little curtsy before introducing herself. "My name is Mercy. I used to live on my family's estate, but other than that I don't remember much. I woke up one day in a strange town and they were kind enough to let me stay in that nice hotel." she explains. "Hotel?" Roxy says. Mercy points to the KDP. "That one over there. Its quite accommodating and the staff is very entertaining. Judging from you I'd say that the whole town likes to dress up in costume?" she says. Mercy begins feeling Roxy's wings and marveling at how real they feel. "She's obviously not in her right mind." Roxy whispers to you. "No, I think she's not in her right time." you say back. "She doesn't even seem to realize she's a zombie." Roxy sighs. "Well lets get her back to the hospital. They can deal with her."

As the two of you whisper with one another Mercy spots you on Roxy's shoulder. "Oh! You've got a bug on your shoulder" she exclaims and snatches you off in a flash. You struggle as she holds you between her fingers. Her glove is worn away in spots, probably from being underground. "Actually, this bug looks familiar." she notices. "They're quite the delicacy where I come from! I've seen one scurrying around the hotel but I haven't been able to catch it." Mercy moves you to her open mouth and prepares to eat you. Before she can though Roxy snatches you away. "Uh, sorry but I'd rather you didn't eat him." she says. You've almost been eaten a number of times so Roxy's developed good reflexes in these situations. "Why not? Is it your pet or something?" Mercy inquires. "Tell her I'm human!" you say to Roxy. "I think that would be a shock to her. We should let the KDP handle that." she tells you. Mercy shakes her head and turns away. "No matter. I just wanted to walk along the beach. The hotel staff doesn't let us leave for some reason. I finally manged to slip past them so I'm not going to waste this day." You give Roxy a sympathetic look. "She seems really happy to be out here. Maybe we should let her walk on the beach and then take her back." you suggest. What do you do?
15522221.title: Out For A Stroll

155222212.content:
Roxy isn't one hundred percent sure about what to do in this kind of situation. Mercy definitely wasn't an ordinary mental patient. She sure wasn't like any of the psychos that regularly broke out of the KDP. She seemed more ignorant and naive than actually insane. Although it would probably be best not to be seen around her considering that she had just tried to eat you, so you crawl back behind Roxy's long hair as Roxy lets out a sigh and then she takes Mercy by the hand. "Uh," she says. "Right this way... Mercy. Welcome to Gravefield Beach." "Gravefield Beach?" asks the southern belle zombie. "That's an ominous name for a little old beach. Oh well, looks charming." "Right this way." Roxy was escorting Mercy down the beach and you turn to see Mercy's half-rotted face and from your position you could even see the inside of her mouth. How on Earth could she have not noticed that she was dead? Was she that much of a ditz. She probably died in her sleep if she hadn't realized how big she was.

"Mercy," says Roxy. "How exactly did you find yourself in Terrordale?" "I don't really know myself, sug," says Mercy as she scratches her face, giving you a good few of her bony fingers. "I woke up out in a rather large rock garden. For some reason, the rocks looked like crosses and angels. Then I passed by some rather odd looking tree stumps that looked like they were made of iron. I waited hours for a carriage to come. The first one looked mighty strange since there wasn't a horse in front of it and the carriage looked an awful lot like this strange beetles that kept ramming into my feet. I definitely ain't in Texas anymore." Not only did she not know she was dead, she had no idea she was 325ft tall. Then again, she came from a time and a place where folks weren't well educated since she was clearly from the time of the wild west.

Mercy just kept looking around and saw several of the beachgoers "Now those folks are strange. Going swimming in their costumes like that." "Uh, yeah," said Roxy nervously. "Costumes. Mercy, the uh... night before you arrived at the... hotel, do you remember anything strange?" "Well," said Mercy. "I'll admit I was rather drowsy the night before. I think the lemonade made me sleepy. It tasted rather funny." Funny lemonade? Aha, she must've been poisoned to death. "By the way," said Mercy. "That's a very realistic gargoyle costume you're wearing. What did you use for the wings." "Uh," said Roxy trying to hide the fact that her wings were in fact real. "Leather." "Aha, and what did y'all use for the big pot-belly? Is that a sack of flower under there." Roxy bit her lip in frustration as you laughed into her ear. "Quiet, Stephen," says Roxy. "Or I'll see how good a butt plug you make." You quickly shut up as Mercy continues to walk along the beach.

Roxy then sees Mesa's grill up ahead and smiles. "Uh, Mercy. You must be starving. You look like you haven't had anything to eat in centuries." "I'll admit, I am feeling a little peckish." You just hope humans aren't on the menu. Roxy walks Mercy up to Mesa's grill. "Howdy, Roxy," said Mesa. "Who's your friend?" "Mesa," says Roxy. "This is Mercy." "Pleasure to meet y'all," says Mercy as she shakes hands with Mesa. "You're the first fellow southerner I've seen in this quaint little town." Mesa then pulled up a seat and smiled. "Does it hurt to sit down with that thing on?" asked Roxy pointing to Mercy's bustle. "You get used to it." "So," said Mesa. "Can I start you two ladies off with a couple of drinks? Coca Ghoula? Sprite? Beer?" Mercy was looking hard at the menu. "You wouldn't happen to have sarsaparilly would y'all, sug?" Mesa raises an eyebrow.

"Uh, Roxy," you say. "I'm not sure if we can keep this up forever. Sooner or later she's going to find out that she was poisoned to death centuries ago." Roxy lets out a sigh. "I must say," she said. "She's surprisingly well preserved. You'd think she'd be nothing but bones by now." Mesa hands Mercy what looks like a soda. "I'm all out of sarsaparilly." Says Mesa sarcastically. Regardless, the undead southern belle just takes her drink and drinks it, not noticing that her rotted lips are causing it to leak out, to say nothing of the holes on her actual body. Roxy lets out a sigh. "This is going to be a long day."

Then who should sit next to Roxy and Mercy but...
155222212.title: Zombie Belle

choices: In the Parking Lot Making a Scene
1552222121.content:
"Ugh! What is that horrible stench!" asks a familiar and very unfriendly voice. "Did something die over here? The stench is otherworldly." You let out a groan. "Stella." That fairy walked up holding her nose as she landed next to Roxy who let out a groan. "Hi, Roxy," says Stella smugly. "I see you're a fat **** like you usually are." Roxy's eyes glowed red at that comment. "I see you're a blonde, skinny, obnoxious cretin that even Puck wouldn't touch with a caber." Stella just stuck her tongue out at Roxy. Man, you hated that stupid fairy. Somebody definitely needs to take her down a peg or two.

Stella sniffed the air again and noticed Mercy still looking at the menu. "Ugh," says Stella. "So that's what I've been smelling. I don't know why Fran lets them on the beach. They'll only poison the water the moment they step in." Roxy gave a growl. She wanted to tell off Stella for being anti-zombie but she didn't want to cause any distress to Mercy who seemed to be horrified at what she was reading. "Good grief. Don't tell me y'all cook dogs in this town. That's just plain old horrid." Mesa let out a groan. "Of course I don't cook dogs, you idget. That's grade-A apatosaurus meat. You know, dinosaurs?" "Dinosaurs?" asked Mercy with a laugh. "Don't y'all be ridiculous. Dinosaurs ain't been around for millions of years." Stella raised an eyebrow before Mercy noticed her.

"Oh, y'all must be a friend of Ms. Roxy's. I like your outfit. Though it looks a bit lazy compared to all the others I've seen. But still, those fake wings are impressive." Stella just gags. "Me? Friends with that yellow-skinned, leather-winged whale? Yeah right. Wait a minute, costume?! What are you talking about, zombie?" Mercy seems very confused. "Zombie? What's a zombie?" "What's a zombie?!" asks Stella in disbelief. "It's what you are, numbskull!" Mercy lets out a scoff. "I don't think I like the way you talk about me. Y'all still haven't answered my question?" Roxy and you are both shocked. "Stella!" you yell. "Don't!"

Unfortunately, tact has never been one of Stella's strong suits. "Listen here, Daisy Duke," says Stella. "A zombie is a reanimated corpse. If you want to know what one looks like, look in the mirror, because you're apparently too stupid to realize that you're dead. I don't know how you came back to life but you have obviously not been alive for some time." Roxy gasps. You give a gulp. Who knows how Mercy would react to hearing that she was a zombie. However, Mercy was still not convinced of her undeath. "That's crazy talk. I'm as alive as they come. If I was dead do y'all think I'd be talking to you right now. I may be out of my element but I ain't dead. Just a little misplaced. I woke up in a rock garden before I made my way too..." "That wasn't a rock garden, stupid!" yells Stella. "That was a cemetery! Not only are you a zombie but you're a giant zombie. How dense can you be."

It takes Mercy a while to process what Stella said but she just laughs it off. "Y'all are very funny, little missy," she said. "That's the most absurd thing I've ever heard." "Then maybe this will convince you." Mesa lets out a confused snort and then Stella thrusts her hand into Mercy's chest and makes her scream. "Stella!" yells Roxy. Stella pulls her hand out and takes out what looks like Mercy's heart. It was shriveled and looked like it was so dry it would've take much to reduce it to dust. Mercy was horrified at seeing her own heart and held her chest as she panted but then she realized that she wasn't dying. Stella then gave a smirk and held up a compact mirror to show Mercy her undead face. Mercy takes a look at herself and makes a face of pure horror. "You can have your heart back in a minute," says Stella smugly. "It doesn't work anymore anyhow. Also, that building over there, it's a mental hospital. I'd say you're one of the patients. Clearly you were admitted because you couldn't figure it out for yourself."

Mercy is horrified but then she gagged and realized something. "Then that strange delicacy," she said. "Those bugs." "Those weren't bugs," says Stella. "Those were human beings you ate. And by the way, nobody in this town is wearing a costume. They're all real monsters. Including me." Stella flew up into the air and Mercy looked in pure shock. Roxy gives a look of sympathy. "Stay calm, Mercy," she says. "Stay calm." But Mercy can't stay calm and runs off screaming as she tries to hide her rotted face under her parasol.

At that moment Stella decides to be extra nasty and pulls on Mercy's dress to strip her into her undergarments. Underneath Mercy's dress, she looked rather voluptuous and hot albeit still decayed. She had a rather large pair of breasts and what Roxy thought was a bustle was just a rather large bubble butt. One of Mercy's legs was shown to have decayed into bone while the other was still flesh and it was shown that some of Mercy's ribs were exposed. Mercy screams as she sees the rest of herself and then tries to hide her corset and panties as she runs off.

"Mercy!" you yell. Roxy gives a glare at Stella. "You are so insensitive, Stella." Stella lets out a scoff. "I'm a fairy, it's what I do." Roxy lets out a groan. "As soon as I tend to Mercy, I will squash you like a bug." Roxy then flies off in order to try and find any sign of Mercy. "She's gotta be around here somewhere," you say. "It's not like a giant zombie with a parasol is going to be hard to find." Roxy looks down to see several beach umbrellas. "That's what you think, Stephen. Just keep an eye out for her. She's out of her time, just found out she's a zombie and is scared beyond belief." "Aha," you say. "There she is?"

But where is Mercy at the moment?
1552222121.title: Fairy Insensitive

info.brief_description: You're a human lifeguard on a beach for giant monsters. Can you survive? Fantasy Only.
info.description:
(9/21/2016: Under new management. Originally created by RedHurricane)

You are Stephen, a human washed up on Gravefield Beach in Terrordale, a city populated entirely by titanic sized versions of the monsters of folklore and legend. You had no idea this would happen but you made the most of it becoming a lifeguard at the beach. They needed somebody who could keep a good eye and weren’t picky about what they hired. Of course, being the only human in a beach for monster giants is extremely dangerous. Can you guard your own life?

          Beach Staff

Roxy Maza- Your partner. A 750ft tall gargoyle with long black hair and yellow skin. A little on the pudgy side but still beautiful. You basically ride on Roxy’s shoulder and act as a second pair of eyes for her. She's also the older (but shorter) sister of Petra from my Monster Arms story.

Fran Cisco- Your supervisor. A blue skinned troll girl, muscular in appearance. Shorter than Roxy but taller than Stella. Fran is overly friendly towards humans, but not very smart. Speaks in broken English. But she does like you, a little more than you’d like.

Chihiro- A younger new addition to the beach. (Addition by UltraGTS), A giant 18 year old (in appearance) chimera with crab claws for hand, a human upper body, a scorpion's tail and spider legs. Appears in certain story lines. She was originally going to be a mutate and then I retconned her to a nightmare but she got out of hand and her creator harassed me to a breaking point so I made her a chimera human hybrid. (Note: Please only include Chihiro in this interactive. I don't want to see her in any of my other inter actives).

Lascivite Angeline Jedore- An OC of the 12th doctor. Lascivite is a 950ft tall forest green-skinned and purple haired succubus. She has an athletic body but gargantuan breasts due to a medical condition. Unlike other succubi, he prefers to be by herself, not being interested in romance. This makes her seem cold, but she can warm up to particually nice people. Despite this, she is obsessed with her unusually large breasts, always taking extra care of them. She loves horror movies and books, particularly psychological thrillers. She adores the color purple.

          Enemies

Stella Birnbaum- A blonde haired hourglass figured fairy with bright orange butterfly wings. Stella is a rival lifeguard of both you and Roxy and extremely haughty. She’s very arrogant towards humans and is always making you feel small(er than usual). You really hate her and think she shouldn’t be working here.

Paisley Van Manen- Your worst enemy. A giant hourglass shaped mermaid with short primrose colored hair and the tail of a purple tiger shark. Paisley lives in an underwater grotto near the beach and is rude and insulting towards land based monsters. Unfortunately for you humans are Paisley’s favorite food and she warned you that if she saw you in the water, she’d gobble you up. Speaks in a slight British accent.

          Surfers- You know a few surfer girl monsters that visit Gravefield Beach. Some are good and some you don't get along with.

Lila Tepes- A young and voluptuous vampire girl. She's very sweet and bubbly and surprisingly has never tasted blood in her life. In fact, Lila is so afraid of blood that she panics whenever she sees it. In your opinion, she's a pitiful excuse for a vampire.

Connie Andrews- A BBW goth naga girl. Connie has the upper body of a dark skinned woman, but the lower body of a purple anaconda. Despite her fearsome appearance, she's friendly towards you. Of course, you think it's only because she can't eat humans without suffering an allergic reaction.

Reimu Shiibashi- The showoff jock of the monster surfers who visit the beach. Reimu is a giant gray furred baku girl and doesn't like humans that much. She often acts as if you're not there

Carmen Bando- A giant curvaceous bandersnatch woman. Resembles an orange furred cross between a dingo and a fox. She's the jokester of the surfers and has a big appetite, though she never gains a pound. You don't know if she'd eat humans but you don't want to take chances seeing she'll eat everything else.

Hannah Yamaguchi- A blue skinned tengu woman with long white hair. Unfortunately for you, hannah enjoys torturing humans, although the other monsters are unaware of it, she is a sadistic creature that treats humans as little more than insects. You're afraid of the things she'd do to you if she caught you.

Kouna Andrews- An addition by UltraGTS. Kouna is Connie's twin sister and looks identical to Connie albeit more girly and with a pink bikini. Like her sister, Kouna doesn't eat humans and instead is a lot more flirtatious, especially towards you.

          Beachgoers- There are several non surfers at the beach you often interact with.

Kath Williams- A white furred weretigress. A shy sort of monster that visits the beach in order to paint. She never interacts with the other monsters, but you think she’s nice.

Mesa Bovine- A giant white and brown furred minotaur woman, heavyset in body shape with a huge udder. Mesa runs a beach grill and is very friendly towards both you and Roxy. Though she often tells you that one day she’ll cook you up to serve you to the next monster girl to come to the grill or eat you herself. You really hope she’s joking.

Opal- A giant pinkish skinned carbuncle. A creature resembling a giant puma with a crystal in her forehead. Opal has the beach’s permission to work as a fortune teller in a “Tent of Telekinesis”. Although you’re not sure what she thinks of humans.

Laura Lernean- A red skinned hydra scuba diver. Her four heads are always finishing each other’s sentences. You don’t know much about her since Laura never speaks to anyone. Unlike the other beach goers Laura is a scuba diver. However, everyone says she’s trouble since she’s from Horrorville.

April Howler- A pair shaped dire werewolf artisan that uses seashells and glass washed up on the beach for her crafts. She's crazy about you and tells people that she's your girlfriend whenever you're together. You usually try to avoid her because April's a borderline yandere. Ironically, even though April's friendly towards humans, Lupa from Monster Arms is her cousin.

Elena Ryd Murdoch - A 950ft tall Pegasus and an additional by the 12th Doctor. Elena has grey fur all over her body, long, black hair, and brown eyes. She has large wings on her back and hooved feet. She has average sized breasts and a decent butt. Due to her years of drinking, she has developed a permanent beer gut, which is actually full of beer. Elena's years of drinking have left her in a permanently drunken state. By that, we mean even if she hasn't had a drink for days, she will still be completely drunk. Her years of drinking have also changed her body: her belly has become a beer storage facility, and whenever she drinks, the beer doesn't digest; it just stays in her gut and accumilates and she can't get it out. For some reason, it never spoils. Despite both of these, she is fairly nice.

Andrea Kennick - A 900ft werewolf who is an O.C. of the 12th Doctor. Andrea has brown eyes, but no hair or fur due to her nature, showing her icy blue skin. Her body shape is unknown, since she always wears a bulky mechanical suit to simulate a sub-zero environment. It is known that she does not have Lactose Overload Syndrome. Andrea was born with a bizarre genetic mutation that made it so she cannot survive out of a sub-zero environment. It also made it so anything she touched was frozen solid. As she got older, she was given a suit to keep her body at sub-zero and keep her freezing ability in check. Despite this, Andrea is a fairly decent person, if a bit anti-social. She has earned the nickname "Ms. Freeze" due to her nature resembling comic character Mr. Freeze. She hates this nickname.

Susan Marcus Carvonis - An 800ft chimera addition by the 12th Doctor. Susan has three heads: a snake, a hippo, and a panther. All The Snake has black scales, orange eyes and is bald, the hippo has grey skin, blue eyes and is bald, and the panther head has light grey fur, black eyes, and short red hair. The body is that of a really fat, anthro panther with a snake for a tail. She wears a blue, one-piece bikini. Like Aquell, Susan is insane. She harbors an unhealthy obsession with Roxy, having a creepy crush on her. A room in her home is even a stalker shrine to Roxy. She is usually seen watching Roxy or stealing swimsuits she has worn and wearing them herself. Each head has a different approach: the snake, who is shy, watches from afar; the hippo, the most sane head, simply wants to talk; and the panther, the most insane head, steals her possessions and becomes violent if anyone talks to Roxy. Each head also has a different appetite: the snake is a vegan, the hippo only eats cooked meat, and the panther eats humans.

Zoe Orcaton - A 985ft tall Were-orca who is an OC of the 12th Doctor Zoe has shiny black-and-whit skin, no hair, and black eyes. Being a were-orca, Zoe is gargantuanly obese, to the point where if she were human, she'd weigh 8 tons. Despite this, she is not immobile. She has legs and can walk on land. Zoe is the definition of a glutton. There's one thing on her mind at all times, and that's "eat, eat, eat". As long as Zoe is eating, she's happy. Whenever she is seen, she is always eating. She is also extremely proud of her massive weight. She thinks fat is sexy, and wants all women in the world to be fat. She is friends with Helena Krofft in Monster Slopes.

         Psychos- There’s a mental hospital built near the beach that's called the Kaiju Disarming Plant because of the large number of dangerously insane monsters admitted there. Unfortunately some of the patients tend to escape the K.D.P. and retreat to the beach. You and Roxy have to make sure they don’t cause trouble on the beach.

Natasha Bailey- A drider giantess with the lower body of a black widow spider. Natasha is an insane monster that thinks she's a pirate in the 17th century. She's the most openly violent of the five regular patients that break out and is known to mug people and trap them in her spider webs. You and Roxy mainly have to make sure she doesn't attack anyone.

Jen Handel- An blue and white haniver girl. Basically a monster resembling a humanoid manta ray. Jen suffered a head injury and now thinks she is Dr. Saturday, a mad scientist from a science fiction movie she watched. She is out to try and take over Terrordale, starting with the beach.

Eunice Dent- A spriggan, a type of grotesque fairy. Half her body has red colored while the other half is blue. She's extremely bipolar. One minute she's nice and sweet, and the next minute she's dangerously angry and psychopathic. Stella doesn't like her, seeing her as a disgrace to the fairy race.

Mira Clay- A giant purple skinned clay golem girl. Mira is a paranoid giantess who believes that the sky is evil and is going to fall down on her head. As such, she can usually be seen hiding indoors or underneath something.

Phoebe Ordain- A beaked phoenix harpy girl. Phoebe is a pyromaniac and the most dangerous psycho in the hospital. Opal holds a grudge against her for burning down her tent.

Avery- An addition by UltimateNeo. Avery is a 27 year old 300ft chimera creature. Unlike most chimeras, she is a hybridized monster with the appearance of a landshark, the strength and suction cupped arms of an octopus and the ice powers of a Yuki-Onna. She can breathe underwater and turn invisible. Normally peaceful but goes into a rage yelling "Musha, musha, MUSHA!" whenever she sees blood. She started to go crazy when she was 12 and witnessed her human boyfriend murdered by a vampire serial killer who kidnapped them both. She snapped and tore the killer apart and was said to have eaten part of her. That's when she was sentenced to the K.D.P.

         Other

Dr. Kaguya West- (Addition by UltimateNeo) The head of the mental hospital. A giant kitsune woman with golden fox tails and ears. She's usually the one to report the psychos breaking loose. Fortunately for you she's mostly a vegetarian as far as humans are concerned.

Aquell Cousteau Harker- An addition by the 12th Doctor. Aquell is a 725ft tall oni with orange skin, red eyes, and short black hair. She has small horns on the top of her head and fangs. Her body used to be hourglass shaped, but her years in her submarine have somehow made her incredibly fat. Aquell is a bizarre woman. She is always on her submarine, searching the sea bed for sunken treasure. She used to do it with her best friends, but they died in a storm. The loneliness and loss of her friends drove her insane. She now thinks of the submarine as a living person and her best friend.

Sheila (no last name) - An 800ft tall electricity elemental who is an OC of the 12th Doctor. Sheila's body is made of yellow electricity that constantly sparks. The electricity on the top of her head is made to look like a ponytail. She has solid white eyes and no mouth, though she can still talk and eat. She is very fat from her years of laying around, though is still fairly attractive. Sheila is probably the laziest person ever. When she shows up at someone's house, she plants herself on the couch and never, ever leaves. She'll mooch off of whoever owns the house, eating their food and hogging the TV. She's also very rude, insulting everyone she meets and belching a lot. She is too lazy to get a job, so she never pays for ANYTHING.

Ambrosine Sanfourche Peinture - A 1100ft succubus who is an OC of the 12th Doctor Ambrosine has violet skin, black eyes, and medium length red hair tied in a bun. Ambrosine is massively fat, to the point of immobility, though she uses a motorized board to get around. She always wears black underwear and an artist's smock. Ambrosine is a famous French artist, known for her incredible paintings of landscapes, people, and things she dreams of. But she is also very temperamental. She demands nothing less than perfection from her models, who are all succubi, and flies into a rage if things aren't 100% perfect. She always speaks French, so one model, Kali, has to translate for her.


Rules

Please keep the story in second person.
All monsters are giants. 300 feet is the minimum
Horrorville and Terrordale are twin cities. However, monsters from both cities don’t get along with each other most of the time.
Keep male monsters to a minimum. Only females can interact with or harm Stephan
Also keep underage monsters to a minimum. All the monsters on the character list are adults.
No toilet stuff
No extreme sexual content. Keep it clean, please.
NO HUMAN GIANTESSES! It says Monster in the title. That should give you a clue.
I'd prefer for this story to remain a fantasy story with fantasy styled monsters
Please keep the monsters fantasy monsters. No Sci Fi please like mecha, robots or mutates. I had a bad experience with them back when this story had them
Try not to end the story too soon
You can add more monster girls if you want
Please no Male Preds or any interaction with Male Giant privates! I thought I didn't have to say it!

Those are the rules. Try to survive.

For what the beach staff do in the winter. Go here.
http://www.Writing.Com/main/interact/item_id/1957152-Monster-Slopes
